description: Download the official app of the Mississippi Braves (Double-A affiliate of the Atlanta Braves) to stay connected all season long! With this app, M-Braves fans have the ability to read the latest news, purchase tickets, access the promotional calendar, and check out group outing options. Fans can also access the latest M-Braves roster and stats, check out the schedule for upcoming games, and watch live updates on games. Along with quick links to social media outlets and YouTube, fans can also view the menu for the Farm Bureau Grill and much more!

★★★★ Rope'n'Fly - From Dusk Till Dawn is the sequel to the best selling game, Rope'n'Fly ★★★★ • More than 25 million addicted Rope'n'Fly players can't be wrong!  • #1 top free app in US, France, Germany, UK, Australia, and more • #10 top free app in more than 50 countries • New and Noteworthy by Apple in multiple countries • The sequel to the #1 most downloaded swinging game, now in HD and universal! • From the makers of Stickman Downhill, Stickman Soccer, Stickman Base Jumper, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Birds, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and more Use your ropes to swing a destructible ragdoll from one skyscraper to the others. You have full control over your ropes, touch on a building to throw your rope there, touch again to release it and fly through the sky. Perform various kind of jumps to get achievements, attach to flying planes or ballons and try to beat your friends or all other players by competing with them for the best score. FEATURES: • Tight and fast paced gameplay • Amazing looking graphics • Realistic physic engine for the player, ropes and objects • Play in different daytime, from Dusk through Night till Dawn • Customize your player, choose from characters and ropes • Destructible ragdoll effects • Achievements and Leaderboards • Various objects to rope to like balloons or planes • Endless playing in never ending cities • Various game modes including free mode Video Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nN53F1xzA3Q Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions! PERFORMANCE HINT: If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

★ 이제껏 경험해보지 못한 신개념 리워드 앱 찍고벌고! - 5원, 10원씩 적립되는 리워드앱 – 어느 세월에 커피 사먹나요?ㅠ.. - 한푼, 두푼 모아 겨우 적립금 채웠더니, 살만한 상품이 없는 리워드앱 – 헐… - 이제 500원만 더 모으면 커피쿠폰을 구매할 수 있는 데, 갑자기 앱이 사라졌다!! - 이런 사기꾼들.. * 믿고 쓰는 No.1가격비교사이트 다나와에서 서비스하는 리워드앱은 하나, 건당 최소 100원에서 최대 5,000원(카테고리별로 상이)까지 ‘해피머니’로 바로 적립해 드리며! 둘, 쿠폰이나 상품권이 아닌, 현금으로 환급해 드립니다!! * 여러분이 소장하고 있는 상품이나, 보고 있는 상품을 촬영해 간단한 리뷰와 함께 등록만 해주세요. 올려 주신 상품 사진은 다른 고객들에게 유용한 쇼핑 정보로 사용될 거예요. ★ 참여 방법 1. 등록하고자 하는 상품을 찾아 보세요. 2. 다양한 각도로 찍은 상품 사진과 함께 간단한 리뷰를 남겨 주세요.(반드시 직접 촬영한 이미지를 등록해 주세요) 3. 등록된 내용은 관리자 검토를 거쳐(최대 2~3일 이내) 승인 여부가 결정되며, 등록 여부는 내정보에서 확인하시거나, Push 서비스를 통해 안내받으실 수 있습니다. 4. 등록하려고 하는 상품이 없다면, 카테고리 및 판매 URL을 입력하여 “미취급상품 등록 신청”을 해주세요.(오픈마켓(G마켓, 옥션, 11번가, 인터파크 등) 등록상품만 가능합니다.) ★ 해피머니 안내 1. 해피머니 안내 여러분이 올려주신 내용에 대한 보상은 승인될 경우만 지급되며 ‘해피머니’로 쌓이게 됩니다. 단, 해피머니로 적립되어 있더라도, 저작권법 위반 등의 문제가 있어 삭제 조치가 될 경우 지급이 취소될 수 있습니다. 적립된 해피머니의 유효기간은 적립일로부터 2년이며, 유효기간 2년이 지난 후에는 자동 소멸됩니다. 2. 해피머니 지급 방법 해피머니 지급 금액은 카테고리별/상품별로 각각 다릅니다. 다나와 고객들에게 유용한 정보라면 관리자 검토에 따라 추가로 해피머니를 지급해 드립니다. - 적립금을 확실히, 그리고 더 많이 받는 방법 1. 등록하고자 하는 상품의 모델명을 정확히 매칭(사이즈, 용량 등) 2. 상품 사진을 선명하게, 그리고 다양한 각도로(최소1장은 제품명 확인이 되도록) 3. 상품에 대한 장단점을 자세히 알려주기 4. 남들은 없는, 나만의 레어 아이템이 있다면 바로 등록 5. 진행하는 이벤트를 수시로 확인 후 해당하는 상품 등록 3. 해피머니 환급 방법 적립 해피머니가 1만원 이상일 때부터 하단 탭의 ‘내정보’ > ‘해피머니 환급하기’를 통해 현금으로환급이 가능하며, 환급 단위는 10,000원입니다. 환급시 신청금액과 함께 회원아이디와 일치한 본인 명의 소유의 은행명, 계좌번호를 작성하여 신청하여 주시고, 소득 신고 처리 관계로 증빙서류(신분증 사본)을 메일로 반드시 보내주셔야 정상적으로 처리가 가능합니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : (우) 158-718 서울특별시 양천구 목동동로 233-1, 501(목동, 현대드림타워) 전화:1688-2470 ★ earning rewards app to take new concept haeboji not ever experience! 5 W, 10 won earning rewards app - ㅠ Coffee Company to drink at any time ..? description: Small and fast app to give you the information you want right away. ---Widgets--- See today’s rise and set times right on your home screen or lock screen. Five styles of home screen widgets to choose from 1x1, 2x2, 4x1, 1x1+, 4x1+. ---Three Methods for Finding Location and Timezone--- 1. Use your device's GPS to use your current location and timezone. 2. Pick a city from a provided list. This is great if you have no GPS or internet connection. The location and timezone data are stored locally in this list. 3. Use a Google Map to specify a manual location. This works without GPS, but you need an internet connection. IMPORTANT: With this method you must also manually specify the timezone. ---Barely Uses the GPS--- When the GPS is used, it is turned off right after a location is found. Then it continues to use this "last known location" unless you request an updated one. This saves your battery and puts the control of the GPS in your hands. ---Google Map for location without GPS--- Can't get a GPS signal, use the Google Map feature with an internet connection to pick your location. ---Works Without An Internet Connection--- No internet connection is needed for the GPS to work or to choose a city from the list. The data is calculated locally to give you an accurate sunrise and sunset time. If you wish to use the Google Map you will need an internet connection, but once your location is chosen the internet is no longer needed. ---Customize The Display--- Choose to see more or less details. Show or hide seconds, AM/PM, and if the US or EU daylight savings time is used. ---Contact Us For Help or Suggestions--- We love to hear from our users. Please tell us about any problems the app is giving you or if you have a suggestion on how to make it better. ---Why This App?--- Knowing when the sun will rise or set in your area can be useful for many reasons, such as: - Hunting - Fishing - Photography - General Aviation Pilots - Camping - Hauling Wide Loads - Trucking - Walking
release_text: - Now works on Lollipop Android 5.0 by forcing the date picker to show as a spinner

description: Plumber is a free easy-to-use puzzle game with HD graphics in which your job is to prevent a flood from happening ! Simply turn the different pipe pieces by touching them and connect them together to form a complete pipe. When you create a pipe, you will reduce the overall water levels. Make sur you anticipate a possible overflow! Two game modes are available: - Arcade mode: adjust as many pipes as you can before the water overflows (including bonuses/penalties) - Challenge mode: evolve through a series of varying difficulty levels (200 levels) With Plumber, you have to show adaptability by developing effective tactics to become an undisputed plumber! Time to fix leaks!

Simple yet powerful app that shows hi-definition real-time animated weather radar images with snowfall, hurricane tracks, lightning strikes, severe weather warnings, storm tracks arrows with hail information, wildfires with firefighting updates, on a fluid responsive map that loads faster than any other app in the Play Store. Plus bookmark unlimited locations on the map to quickly do a radar + forecast check for all your important places. Plus this is the only app that automatically augments land-based radar images with latest images from NOAA satellites covering the Atlantic/Pacific oceans into one single screen. This lets you track and follow the upcoming hurricanes and storms all from the same map. ✓ Install and go, no complex setup ✓ Sharp images ✓ Fast Loading ✓ Near real-time, shows the latest radar images within minutes of being gathered ✓ Hurricane and Tropical Storm Forecast Tracks with detailed information ✓ Severe weather warning boxes on the map with full detail ✓ Lightning strikes on the map within a few minutes of the actual strike! ✓ Storm Track arrows with detailed storm information including hail probability. ✓ Check the current weather + forecast for any point on the map ✓ Intuitive Play/pause/manual modes for moving between frames ✓ Always shows both time-stamp and "minutes ago" with each frame to prevent any confusion while viewing the loop ✓ Select opacity of radar images to your taste ✓ Portrait/Landscape/Full Screen Coverage Notes: If you live in a very-high-altitude town in Colorado (e.g. Fraser, Vail, Aspen), most likely this app will not meet your needs since radar beams get blocked by the tall mountains. Alaska coverage includes only the southern coastal areas, and does not include the Aleutian Chain. Also cloud coverage does not include Alaska and Guam. Notes: ✓ This app is only useful for users in the US, including all 50 states and territories including Puerto Rico and Guam. Please follow our twitter stream at http://twitter.com/hidef_radar for news and updates.
release_text: Now also shows Hurricane and Tropical Storm Forecast Tracks, Lightning Strikes, Storm Track arrows with Hail information and Wildfires with firefighting updates!

description: This app is able to simplify fractions. Just enter the fraction and the app will simplify. Very useful tool for school and college!

Discover hours of enjoyment with DreamQuest Games’ award-winning Championship Rummy 500 digital card game. Ideal for the whole family, Championship Rummy 500 is a modern take on a timeless classic. With multiple levels, beginners and experts alike will call on our personal DreamCoach, Questie, an adorable dragon ready to swoop in with advice and hints, including an introductory 90-second guided tour of the game and a more in-depth Rummy tutorial to refresh you on rules and strategy for this card game. Our cast of realistic and cheerful characters creates a friendly atmosphere that will bring back fond memories. Relax with Championship Rummy 500’s soothing tones and easy pace as you decide when, where, and how many rounds to play. Discover 45 unlockable bonus features, 15 crowning achievements, and win boundless trophies and coins as you play different characters on your Rummy world tour. Share and challenge your friends on Facebook with our new high score list. Extensive customization options and adjustable settings will satisfy even the savviest Rummy 500 player. With features like Undo and Replay, you’ll be a winner in no time. Players looking for even more invigorating play will want to unlock the numerous practice and cheat options as well as thrilling game variations such as 500 Rum, Ten Card, Dots, Kaluki, Spot, Cutthroat, Michigan, Continuity, and Block. FEATURING * Stress-free and simple layouts with colorful HD graphics and soothing tones * Endearing characters with realistic play keep you entertained as you improve * Learn with guided tour and tutorials from Questie, our adorable in-game DreamCoach™ * Sharpen your game strategy with HINTS of not just what to play, but WHY * Collect TROPHIES, share, and challenge your friends’ high scores on Facebook * UNDO, REPLAY, and other Practice options allow you to perfect your game * Explore in-game options with numerous and powerful CHEATS * Discover 45 UNLOCK-able DECKS, players, cheats, and other bonuses * Earn bonus coins FREE through 15 achievements and daily slot pulls * Challenge 12 realistic, entertaining opponents in 4 skill levels * Expert/master players designed by a nationally-ranked card champion * Unlimited Free-to-Play with short sponsored ads between games * Ads can be disabled with coins won from achievements, daily slot pulls, or bought in our store * Unlock variations: 500 Rum, Ten Card, Dots, Kaluki, Spot, Cutthroat, Michigan, Continuity, Block REVIEWS ***** "Great game. Very addictive" -8menout ***** "My favorite card game!" -Violetaurora44 ***** "Plays much faster than my family..." - Alicia **** "Game is a blast and very functional" - Game Girl L

description: The ultimate FIELD GUIDE to TREES OF EUROPE and NORTH AMERICA, all in the palm of your hand! Finally, you have the option to identify species without the help of a heavy book. You get a comprehensive library full of facts, figures, and images. Learn where you can find certain species, how their leaves, flowers, and fruits look like and taste. Find inspiration and experience nature in a whole new way. CONTENT * 200 tree species - 2000 images * Extensive description of the species * Tree names in 7 languages * Scientific identification * Quiz game SEARCH AND IDENTIFY SPECIES BY * APPEARANCE - Size, leaf, flower, color, growth, etc. * FRUIT TYPE - Berry, stone fruit, apple fruit, nut, etc. * HABITAT - North America, Europe, Asia, etc. TRAIN YOUR KNOWLEDGE - QUIZ GAME * Guess species from images * Learn to distinguish different species QUIZ GAME * Guess species from pictures * Learn to distinguish different species NATURE MOBILE on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/naturemobile ABOUT NATURE MOBILE The mission of NATURE MOBILE is to present exciting topics from nature and other areas to a wide audience of interested people, enthusiasts, and experts in an attractive way. You are an author or photographer, you have fascinating ideas or content, please contact us at support@naturemobile.org . CHECK OUT MORE APPS BY NATURE MOBILE
release_text: IMPORTANT UPDATE ---------------- * Andoid 5.0 Support * ONLINE SPECIES CONSULTATION - Enthusiasts from around the world will help identify what species it is. * SIGHTINGS FUNCTION - For each sighting, you can store comprehensive information, e.g. photo, time, GPS position and location. * TRAINING MODE in the trivia game generates your questions according to the different features of species. * Android 4.4 - The data can be moved manually from internal to an external memory card (SD-Card).

Inspired by the Lomo, Holga, Polaroid, Diana, the toy cameras and Hipstamatic. Instant Nostalgia now free. Post your best prints on our Facebook fan page or follow us on Twitter! https://www.facebook.com/RetroCamera https://twitter.com/retroCameraPlus

description: Jessica is a fashion trend chaser. She love all the fashion things. And she has a top standard for her hairstyle too. As an super hairdresser, try your best to design a most appropriate and fashion perfect hair style for her. You should make her new hair style look charming and wow the crowd! Now grab the scissors and get to work as a happy hairdresser! It's a really fun hair salon games for girls and kids! I hope you could enjoy the great kids games!

"GO Keyboard Gold Glow Theme" is a designed by Inner Works Studios, it features a realistic gold looking keyboard . This luxurious theme features beveled gold buttons with a beautiful 3D effect on glowing gold textured background. So replace your old keyboard with a gold one like millionaires do, with the most realistic and well defined gold phone keyboard. We hope you enjoy Gold Glow theme! HOW TO APPLY THE THEME: Download the theme. Press the "Open" button. Press "Apply Theme" button. HOW TO APPLY THE CUSTOM FONT: Press long "?123" key from the keyboard. Press "Advanced settings". Press "Font Settings". Press "Scan fonts". Press "Select font" (now choose the font that has GO Keyboard Gold Glow Theme on it). This is not a standalone app, you need to have GO Keyboard installed in order to use this theme. The theme is high-definition and can be used on tablets too. We used ads to make possible this free premium app. CONTACT US: If you encounter any problems or have any questions contact us at app.skins@gmail.com . Rate this app and let us know your thoughts about it so we may improve.

You can also download it to your device and send it directly to potential employers. This is the best resume builder you'll always need! Never worry about starting from scratch to make a resume. description: Doodle Basketball is an easy yet exciting game with the lifelike physics. The action takes place on a sheet of paper which adds ingenuity and unforgettable atmosphere to the game. Your aim is to gain the maximum points playing with the limited number of balls. Shoot the ball through the basket without it touching the rim and gain additional balls. The more you score, the more various bonuses you get. Compete with the players from all over the world! Become No1 in the world standings! KEY GAME FEATURES: - User-friendly - Off-beat design and sounds - Game-save option - Control mode selection - World standings ******* You can start the movement by touching the screen at any spot. For a swish you get an additional ball. For 3 swishes you get a big basket for 3 shots. For 5 successful shots in a row you receive all spots for 3 shots. For distance shooting you receive more points. The next after the successful shot brings you more points. The less spots there are, the more points you get for each shot.
release_text: 1.0.1: - Revision of the points system. - A new table of records. - Added background image and background music.

description: ==Languages: English , Chinese(繁體中文) ==Description: In AD 225, a long war was happened in China. The commander-in-chief of SHU kingdom named Kong Ming order the first general Zhao Yun to Battle with Nanman Barbarians. Falling stones, rolling logs, poisonous springs, attacks of malaria are everywhere in Nanman. The king of Nanman named Meng Huo is so stronger and crueler than everyone. Can you help Zhao Yun to finish his impossible mission? ==Features: -This title is an Action RPG(arcade beatem up). -New boss characters just like Meng Huo, Lady Zhu Rong, Wu Tu Gu. -New armies: Elephant warrior, Cane armor-clad soldier, Fire witches, poisonous snakes & wildest beasts. -New riding system: you can ride the horse or elephant to fight to enemy. -New magic system: by collecting a fixed amount of flags, you can push the FLAG/MAGIC icon button to clear full-screen enemies. -New BAR system: when the green bar in the left up side fulled, you can push the FIRE icon button to launch a special powerful attack. ==How to play: Dragon of the Three Kingdoms (DOTK) is an Action RPG(arcade beatem up). It is very easy to play for anyone. Use the touch control gamepad to move Zhao Yun, and push the SWORD icon button to fight with enemy or pick up items and flags. By collecting a fixed amount of flags, you can push the FLAG/MAGIC icon button to take a full-screen attack. When the green bar in the left up side fulled, you can push the FIRE icon button to launch a special powerful attack. Sometimes the FIRE icon button change into the HORSE icon button, it mean that you could ride the horse or elephant by your side immediately. When you are riding, you become more speedy and powerful.

English News Jagran Post Android App keeps you ahead and updated with top stories and breaking news of the day. This Android App features objective, reliable news from India & World including current headlines on politics, cricket, business, entertainment and more. Read and explore the latest news coverage across the globe by installing the app. Features: 1.Designed to reduce loading time. 2.Option to read the articles from the section(s) visited on offline mode. 3.Push Notification ON/OFF. 4.Recent read article option (list of 10 latest read articles, after that older will be removed automatically). 5.Options to share the article and share the App. 6.Text adjustment icon on story detail page. 7.Swipe across articles, next previous buttons and Bookmark on click.

description: Pixel Dog Quiz is one of the cool Pixel Style game. Easy to play and Free! Dark may seem a little eerie, but shine a little light on things and you'll find there's nothing to be afraid of at all. Touch Buttons to Move and Jump. Help the Pretty Dog go home. Simple concept, but Plentiful funny. The catch is that in the dark, hazards like spikes can appear and be harmful, and while the light can get rid of some of them, it can also reveal gaps in ground you could walk across when no light shone on it. Самые любимые и популярные песни нашего детства для вашего Андроид устройства. Содержание сборника песен для детей: - Начинаем, Начинаем! - Да здравствует сюрприз - Дуэт Трубадура и Принцессы (из м\ф "Бременские музыканты") - Зачем человеку каникулы - Непогода - Это называется природа - Праздник - Когда мои друзья со мной (Автор текста: Танич М. Композитор: Шаинский В.) - Всё мы делим пополам - Где водятся волшебники - Кручу, кручу, кручу педали (из мультфильма "Прогулка кота Леопольда") - Леди-совершенство (Песня из фильма "Мэри Поппинс, до свидания") - Ни кола, ни двора (мультик "Три поросенка") - Как хорошо быть хулиганом (Песни из кинофильма "Каникулы Петрова и Васечкина") - Рыцарь – это человек - Мария Мирабелла (детский музыкальный анимационно-художественный полнометражный фильм) - Зелёная история - Ветер перемен - Рондо ( английские песни для детей) Песня — наиболее простая, но распространенная форма вокальной музыки, объединяющая поэтический текст с несложной, легко запоминающейся мелодией. Иногда сопровождается оркестикой (также мимикой). Песня в широком значении включает в себя всё, что поётся, при условии одновременного сочетания слова и напева; в узком значении — малый стихотворный лирический жанр, существующий у всех народов и характеризующийся простотой музыкально-словесного построения. Песни отличаются по жанрам, складу, формам исполнения и другим признакам. Песня может исполняться как одним певцом, так и хором. Песни поют как с инструментальным сопровождением, так и без него Музыка — искусство, средством воплощения художественных образов для которого являются звук и тишина, особым образом организованные во времени. The most favorite and popular songs of our childhood for your Android device. Contents of the collection of songs for children: - Begin, begin! - Long live the surprise - Duet Troubadour and Princess (from m \ f "Bremen Town Musicians") - Why would a man holidays - Bad weather - It's called nature - Holiday - When my friends with me (Lyricist: Tanic M. Composer: V. Shainskiy) - All we divide in half - Where there are wizards - Steeper steeper steeper pedal (from the cartoon "Cat Walk Leopold") - Lady perfection (Song from the movie "Mary Poppins, Goodbye") - No Coke nor the court (the cartoon "Three Little Pigs") - How nice to be a bully (Song from the movie "Vacation of Petrov and Vasechkina") - Knight - a man - Maria Mirabella (children's musical and artistic animated feature film) - Green History - The wind of change - Rondo (English songs for children) Song - the most simple, but common form of vocal music, combining poetic text with a simple, catchy melody. Sometimes accompanied orkestikoy (also mimicry). The song in the broad sense includes everything that is sung, provided a simultaneous combination of words and melody; in the narrow sense - small lyrical poetry genre that exists in all people and is characterized by the simplicity of music and verbal construction. The songs vary in genre, warehouses, and other forms of performance characteristics. The song can be performed as a single singer and choir. Songs sung as with instrumental accompaniment, and without it Music - art tool for the realization of artistic images which are sound and silence organized in a special way in time.

An IBM compatible PC emulator that can run early operating systems such as MS-DOS on your Android device. This is a port of JPC for Android. JPC is a pure Java emulation of an x86 PC hardware in software. Bundled in this release is FreeDOS (Like MS-DOS) and a selection of shareware games on a virtual drive C:/ This emulator is extremely demanding and will only run on modern devices. Keyboard and mouse input is very basic and is still in development. This is intended for demonstration use only, although the bundled games run, they are not playable. JPC is open source software and available here: http://jpc.sourceforge.net

description: Description: Five (5) games in 1. Easy to play but highly addictive. Click on the screen and hold it down to move the candy cane left and right to crash the falling candies from hitting the bottom of the screen. Game Play: ★ Wave level – move the candy cane left and right to smash the candies. Candies come down faster and faster as the game progresses. As soon as a Red candy goes off of the bottom the screen, your game ends. ★ Spread level – same as the Wave level except each subsequent candy is 1 to 3 candies apart from the prior candy. ★ Random level – same as the Wave level except each candy can appear anywhere. ★ Skip level – hit only the Red candy and miss the Blue candy. Game ends when you either hit a Blue candy or a Red candy goes off of the bottom of the screen. ★ Rainbow level – each row will have one (1) Red candy and 2 other colored candies. Move the small candy cane so it only hits the Red candies while making sure to miss all other colored candies. Game ends when either a Red candy goes off of the bottom of the screen or you hit a non-Red candy. Compete against your friends and family. See who has the highest score! Have fun!

eni corporate is the new free app that offers constant updates, on your mobile devices, about all of eni’s institutional news and corporate communications. You can access press releases, check the corporate calendar and events, follow the share price performance or get more information about eni’s presence around the world and its activities in international markets. When you find content of specific interest, whether a video or audio clip or any other multimedia file, you can save it in the “My library” section and go back to it whenever you want. The content is in both Italian and English and the app is available in standard format for iPhone and in HD for iPad. Dashboard: the main screen features a selection of the most important content. Eni in the world: an interactive map that highlights all of Eni’s international activities. Eni on the stock exchange: follow the performance of Eni’s share price on financial markets. Press releases: to keep up with all the company’s news and official communications. Corporate calendar: for the dates of the announcement of the company’s results. Events: a detailed list of institutional events. Media library: a multimedia gallery with images, video and audio. Documents: a selection of official reports and publications. Glossary: definitions of the most important terms used in the world of energy. My library: a collection of eni corporate content selected and saved by you.

Just Retire is a retirement calculator and planner. Simply input some basic information, and Just Retire will generate your expected balance at retirement, your expected retirement income, as well as a robust table that tells you how much to contribute each month, your expected retirement fund balance each year, and what inflation will do to your plan. Just Retire supports: -Saving and loading profiles so you only ever have to input your info once. -Accounting for current savings -Accounting for contribution growth over time -Accounting for interest -Accounting for inflation -Accounting for supplementary income like Social Security benefits or financial assistance from family members -Accounting for tax (ex. put 0% if you have a Roth IRA account) -Accounting for a legacy you want to leave behind -Tracking principle contributions vs. interest earned -Sensitivity analysis by tweaking inputs on the fly and seeing how fluctuations in expectations will effect your future This app, like all glaukon apps, has been designed with aesthetics and usability in mind. To that end, it comes with 10 beautiful backgrounds, a clean and intuitive interface, a built-in calculator, and plenty of information about the various financial concepts retirement planning deals with. And of course, it comes with an obligatory quote generator. It's what I do. Images from various users at http://www.sxc.hu Quotes from: http://www.quotegarden.com/retirement.html and http://inspirelifeq.blogspot.com/2011/03/retirement-quotes.html

Get real-time wind and water conditions directly from NOAA buoys in North America. Simple map interface shows buoys everywhere you navigate. With over 2 billion downloads, Angry Birds is the most popular mobile game franchise of all time. Play this all-new physics-based slingshot adventure and join the global phenomenon! ----------------------------- IT’S STORY TIME ----------------------------- * THE FIERCE FLOCK - Play as six fearless birds who are fighting to save Golden Island * SUPERPOWERS - Tap and hold to aim, release to unleash the destruction * 120+ STORY LEVELS - Fun and addictive gameplay in the treetops of Golden Island * A VERY BAD BIRD - Gale, aka Bad Princess, will do anything to find the Golden Egg * STELLA’S SCRAPBOOK - Collect cool pics of wacky outfits to use in the game * LUSH GRAPHICS - Enjoy vivid visuals that put the “gold” in Golden Island * TELEPODS - Scan ‘em to bring extra-special birds into your slingshot ----------------------------- GOLDEN ISLAND MAP ----------------------------- * RANDOM LEVELS - Play a near-endless amount of action-packed levels * THEMED EVENTS - Follow @StellaFriends on Twitter for unique challenges * NEW PIGS ON THE BLOCK - Unlock a roster of powerful new pigs with unique abilities * DREAM TEAM - Choose which birds to fling in the random map levels * TREASURE TROVE - Get stolen items back from pigs and assemble them for awesome perks * TOONSTV - Watch Stella’s animated series and other cool shows on your mobile ----------------------------- STELLA IS STELLAR ----------------------------- 5/5 “The new birds are fun and the addition of the superpowers is awesome!” 5/5 “Really fun to play and the graphics are beautiful!” 5/5 “New addiction! Love it...nice twist on original” “There is a real sense of quality with Angry Birds Stella” - Forbes “Angry Birds Stella is an absolute winner.” - Technology Tell “Playing around with the new birds is a blast.” - Gamezebo ----------------------------- BEYOND THE GAME ----------------------------- Discover: http://stella.angrybirds.com/ Follow: https://twitter.com/stellafriends ----------------------------- Angry Birds Stella is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, it’s tons of fun! Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

description: Nemo is designed to start you speaking the most useful words in German immediately and confidently. With millions of downloads from around the world, Nemo is now available for Android phones and tablets. ✓ Every German word is pronounced clearly in high quality audio from a native speaker. ✓ All audio is downloaded to your device, and is available offline or in airplane mode. ✓ Master your accent with the Speech Studio. Simply record yourself saying a phrase and then hear your voice next to the teacher’s. Then try again. You’ll be AMAZED how quickly your foreign accent melts away. ✓ Nemo is not built around lessons at all. It is meant to be picked up throughout the day, whenever you have a few minutes to spare. ✓ NO PRIOR KNOWLEDGE of German is required. Nemo targets the words and phrases most often used in conversation. For beginners, we’ve prepared “If You Only Learn 10 Things”, “If You Only Learn 50 Things”, and “If You Only Learn 100 Things” lists for a fast introduction to the essentials. Intermediate learners can progress to a course of the highest frequency words needed for travel and business and begin to have conversations in German in a month. Advanced students will benefit most from the Speech Studio technology to correct their foreign accent. With Nemo, you can customize flashcards to exercise the language skill you want to improve. When beginning a new topic, setup flashcards to practice translation of German to English so you can build familiarity with new words. Next, switch to translate English to German to train your recall and ability to speak. To complete mastery, switch to cards that specialize in fine-tuning your listening and perfecting your pronunciation. Any card can be marked as a favorite, allowing you to make your own custom deck of cards to focus on the words of the day. Turn on Review Mode to recap what you practiced earlier in the day to boost your memory retention. Dive into what you want to learn at any time. The phrasebook offers quick access to the vocabulary in the app through a German-English dictionary interface. Nemo also functions as a translator. Simply find the words you need in the search interface and play its audio through the device speaker. ◆ Get off the beaten path or find comfort with traveler phrases. ◆ Build your proficiency with numbers and the most important verbs and sentence building blocks. ◆ Supports a “Word Gender” mode to display extra information about the gender of words. German is the primary language spoken in Germany and the cities of Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Frankfurt, Heidelberg and Cologne. Use your new skills to make friends, impress old friends, bring smiles to children, get out of jams, experience new things, talk confidently, and make your travel and cultural experience more rich and fulfilling. Download this free app now!

Our personal trainers will help you loose weight and burn muscle in just a few weeks. Don't do it alone, do it with Muscle Builder. Build Muscle - Create customer workouts around your schedule with the Workout Wizard. - Choose from over 200 exercises to target Chest, Arms, Legs, Abs and Back. - Find nearby Gyms with TripAdvisor - Access to a Personal Trainer 24/7. Knowledge is Power, Learn About Muscle - Muscle School 150 articles covering all topics. - 200 Motivation quotes from famous athletes. - Interactive muscle diagrams - Burn fat with daily step challenges - Find the best gyms in your area with TripAdvisor Recover: If your muscles don't recover they don't grow - Recovery Tracker tracks your muscle recovery. - Workout Calendar tracks recovery - Track most used muscles to prevent over-training - Track least used muscles to blast weak points. Progress: - Get out of your comfort zone. - Recover faster with the recovery planner. - Track your progress with stunning graphs. - Track bodyweight as you burn fat and build muscle. Location Your privacy is key, so we don't store, track or sell any data ever. If you choose to talk to one of our fitness trainers we email you the responses so you have a copy of everything. We never email you otherwise or sell your information. Muscle Builder uses your location only to find Gyms in your area. It does not keep, store or give away your location. FACT the location only works in Find A Gym Feature. Storage Muscle Builder exports all your workouts to XML. So if you decide not to use Muscle Builder, you still have all your workout data. Now that's freedom of information.
release_text: Removed German Language, this will be updated in the future. Updated App Store Icon Fixed bug were some exercise videos were not playing. Trainer chat is now working again. MuscleBuilder is now 100% free, no trials or limitations. Just 110% Pure Muscle and Fitness!

description: ★★★★★ Permission Explanation: The new multi-devices feature uses your network and QR Code reader, other permissions are required by Vpon, ads provider. More details about Vpon: http://www.vpon.com ★★★★★ New Multi-Devices feature! Now, you can play Booming Number with your friends and their own Android phone! ★★★★★ This is a simple game that let YOU and YOUR FRIENDS/FAMILY play together for fun in a meeting/party. Each player chooses a number in the given range. Who chose the booming number would be the loser and some MANUAL punishments should be treated. :p ★★★ FAQ ★★★ Q1. I met the [Error: Package file is invalid] problem, please help me! A1: Please refer the following link, this is a known issue of Google Play Store or downloading error: http://www.thespicygadgematics.com/2011/12/fix-android-package-file-is-invalid.html http://discussion.evernote.com/topic/26828-package-file-is-invalid-android-233/ We also met this issue this afternoon (Jun 14, 2012), without any new updates, we installed Booming Number in the evening successfully. Q2. It seems like there are some rules for Booming Number? A2: No! It's all about random number. Just like another user has mentioned, the range will be decreased due to the number you entered. And according to the probability, it's harder to choose the Booming Number than others. Even in the last round to play in a challenge, you still have 50% not to choose the Booming Number. That's why you think always the last player to get the Booming Number! You should avoid to choose the Booming Number for sure, it's not a bug, it's all about your luck! Have a great gaming time! Q3. Can I set the Upper Bound myself? A3: Click the "Menu" -> "Settings" to change the Upper Bound for Range. Booming Number doesn't support the manual setting for the range since the range could be decreased very fast if you often chose the middle number of the range. And we believe that 2-digit/3-digit upper bounds is suitable for common use for you and your friends/family. Also, the UI looks better and comfortable for showing 2 and 3 digits. Thanks for your support and play. Q4. I want to edit the punishments! A4: Yes, you can edit the punishments (dare) you want! Click MENU when you at the screen of switching the punishment mode. Enjoy it! Q5. Boring game! A5: NOKIA said "Human Technology", and we love it. This is a simple game that let you connect with people. It's not a lonely game. It's about playing together. If you have further problems or suggestions, you are very welcome to visit our website and fan page on facebook since we can't reply your feedback in Google Play Store: http://www.plusdiff.com Updated: 1.6.1 & 1.6.2 ▪ The background sound will be rush when the Booming Number is coming. ▪ Russian Roulette optimized. 1.6 ▪ Added Russian Roulette for punishment. ▪ Edit your own punishments by clicking "menu" in punishments view. ▪ You can support us by buying more punishment items. 1.5 ▪ Background sound bug fixed. 1.4 ▪ Added an option for the range from 0 to 999. ▪ Fixed the display problem for low-resolution mobile phone. 1.3 ▪ Layout and button style changed. 1.2 ▪ Added volume control setting. ▪ Sound effect changed. 1.1 ▪ Added Landscape view. ▪ Bug Fixed.
release_text: ▪ New multi-devices feature! ▪ Ads-on ▪ Removed repeated icon ▪ Open new window to Google Play Store if you don't have QR Code reader (Zxing) ▪ Bug fixed ▪ Tablet layout supported (7" & 10")

description: Update service (excluding bug fix) is stopped from 2.6.0 version. Users with Android 4.1 above mobile devices are strongly recommend to use the next generation app [Alarm Calendar Plus]. [Alarm Calendar Plus] reinforced the function of alarm and a time signal as well as functions of timer and stopwatch are added. Furthermore, user can set up alarm from Google calendar directly. Please refer to Google play for more detail. Please run the FREE version & make sure it run normally on your cellphone before your purchase. In addition to the list view of the familiar, also offer a calendar view(3 days, 1 week, 2 weeks). Easy to understand when alarm will play, operation is also simple. By using "Google Calendar API", support public holidays of multiple countries(regions). In addition, it is possible to register personal holiday also. Repeat alarm can be disabled or enabled on public(private) holidays. Support syetem TTS(Text to speech) engine. Not only alarm, ringtone and music, also can read the time and any input text by voice . Other function: * In cooperation with "Time Signal" app, provides time signal function(chime hourly). * Multiple types of alarms(Only once, Specific day, Day of the week, Day of the month, Every Day, Holidays) * Excluded day set-up for repeat alarm * Widget for next alarm time * Widget for a specific alarm * Alarm history display * Alarm automatic stop possible to the end of the alarm sound(song) or any time from 1 second to 30 minutes * Alarm volume gradual increase (Prevent be surprised to sudden loud alarm sound) * Always be maximum volume * Weather information on alarm screen (only when Google application "News and Weather" is pre-installed.) * Alarm in silent mode(Not supported for all cellphone models.) * shake off/snooze ... Notes: ＊Before you use TTS(Text to speech) feature, please set the TTS engine of the system first. ＊In order to read in locale language, There is a need to pre-install TTS engine that support locale language. ＊Manner mode has its own in some models, but may not voice sounded. Please use the "Alarm on manner".
release_text: Version 2.6.3 * Fix android2.1,2.2 startup bug. Version 2.6.2 * Fix bug in the playback of silent mode for some models. Version 2.6.1 * Fix bugs.

description: "download tumblr" (dt) to browse and batch download pictures from Tumblr blogs. With "download tumblr" (dt) you can bulk download all or a chosen number of pictures from one or several Tumblr blogs. Manage lists of your favorite Tumblr blogs. From a blog of your list you can: .browse it and download the pictures you like one by one, with a long press you launch 'tAdvisor for Post'! .download all the pictures, .download a number of pictures you choose. 'tAdvisor for Post' helps you to identify blogs most likely to please you related to this post. A list of proposed blogs (in orange) is displayed. With a tap on a blog from the list you browse the blog. Then you can save a picture with a single tap on it or directly add the proposed blog to your list with a long press on it. From the list of blogs you can download the number of pictures you decide from all your blogs. When you download a blog pictures are saved from the last published to the oldest picture. You can choose the width of pictures to be saved and the number of pictures to download. You can even precise if BDT has to go back in the past as much it is required to always download the number of pictures you choose or if BDT has just to look at the number of pictures you choose and download them is not done yet. Let's say you have a favorite Tumblr blog with great pictures that you want to save and never miss one. The first time you download all pictures of this blog. Then in your preferences you set to download up to 100 pictures from the last posts only. Every week, you download pictures from this blog. BDT will look at the 100 last posts and download them if necessary. Pictures are saved, by default, locally on your device in the standard directory pictures for later use offline. You can save (export) the list of blogs from dt to an external file. Lists of blogs are saved in your Pictures directory in the downloadTumblr/tbl subdirectory in files with tbl suffix. You can import a saved file later in the dt app. You can do what ever you want with exported list of blogs: share them with friends, setup an internet repository... You can copy or move a blog from your current list to a saved blog list. When the current list has not been saved a light bleue stripe show it. You do not need any Tumblr account. You can set a password in the preferences to protect access to BDT. You can choose the download directory. download tumblr (dt) is an application developed by somerslt software. somerslt software is not responsible for the usage and for the content you can access with download tumblr (dt). All rights reserved. All trademarks, trade names, service marks and logos referenced herein belong to their respective companies. somerslt software and this application download tumblr (dt) are not affiliated with Tumblr (the company or the service). download tumblr (dt) uses Tumblr public API (Application Programming Interface) but is not certified by Tumblr (the company or the service). Copyright © 2015 – somerslt software

Export your current Blog list to an external file and import it later. This allow you to manage several Blogs lists. You can share the exported files with friends, set up a repository on Internet... CAUTION: this application requires a lot of bandwidth. Use it only with a Wi-Fi or a 4G connection!

This app will be FREE until June 1st 2014! Not much time left! Get ahead of the other blackjack players by practicing card counting with this app. Practice your blackjack card counting skills anywhere, anytime, with a myriad of counting systems, including Hi-Lo, Halves, Wizard Ace/Five, Canfield Expert, Canfied Master, Hi-Lo Opt I, Hi-Lo Opt II, KO, Mentor, Omega II, REKO, SilverFox, UnbalancedZen2, WizardAceFive, and Zen! When was the last time you found an app like this, for free? This is the FULL version of Pro Card Counter. This app was created after reading several professional books about blackjack strategy and advanced counting systems. We display a non-invasive ad when resetting the game count, but simply close the ad and we will not bother you a second time during your session. No need for an online connection. This app will not teach you the basics of blackjack card counting. You must already know how to count cards to find this app useful. Version 1.3 includes new bug fixes and UI improvements that we hope will improve your experience. Reminder: you write a review → we read your feedback → you get awesome updates! Karma at its finest.

Manage your own RGB LED Lights with your phone or tablet. 44 / 24 buttons Remote control for RGB LED Strip, Lamp. This application simulates the 44 / 24 keys ir remote control distributed with RGB LED devices from china. Works on all devices with Android 4.4 kitkat and infrared transmitter ( ir blaster ) Remember to point the infrared transmitter directly to the receiver. LG/Sony is not supported since it use an own proprietary closed interface rather than standard Android interface. *Use the power button of the different remote controls in the app to find the right controller that turns on your LED lights RGB full colors LED strip controller. on/off Dimmer up, dimmer down. play pause. 20 static colours, auto, flash, 3 colors jump change, 7 colors jump change, 3 colors gradual change, 7 colors gradual change and 6 user defined colors. Speed of dynamic can adjust; Brightness of static can adjust. When users define colors, press custom key to enter the modes, then press red, blue, green add/reduce these 6 keys to mix colors.(Press any key out of the custom area to quit the custom modes, if not, the keys are unavailable). When presses the custom key the second time, the current color will be saved, if press next time, will show the latest saved color. *** FaQ: *** Q: Colors no longer match the buttons, what can I do? A: Do not worry, this is a hidden feature present in some 44 buttons receivers. This also happens with the original remote control. With leds TURNED OFF, by pressing the button "FADE7"( same code of power button in the 24key-C ), the LED will flash once. At this point the color have changed their position. Repeat this procedure until you get the right colors position. The following table may help you RGB - correct position, doing nothing RBG - tap "fade7" 5 times to solve GRB - tap "fade7" 4 times to solve GBR - tap "fade7" 3 times to solve BGR - tap "fade7" 2 times to solve BRG - tap "fade7" 1 times to solve Q: Everything worked fine for some minutes, but now no longer works, how can I fix? A: The problem is probably due to an overload of the RGB driver. Keep in mind that these devices, with difficulty are able to feed 10 meters of LED as declared by the manufacturers. If the load is too big, after a while, will overheat and no longer work correctly. Decrease the strip length, or add an RGB amplifier. bulbs lamp light magic lighting osram Sylvania Mosaic flexible SAMSUNG GALAXY S6 / S6 Edge / S5 / S4 / NOTE 8 / NOTE 10.1 / NOTE 3 / TAB 7.0plus / TAB 2 / TAB 3 / MEGA

description: India's No 1 Job Portal. Access the Best Industry Jobs in INDIA - anywhere, anytime and while on the move! TimesJobs Android App makes it easy to keep up to date with the latest job opportunities. Features - Search and Apply for Jobs - Get Recommended Jobs for your profile right your Android phone - Everytime you apply for a job it gets sync'd to your TimesJobs account - For a new user, we show Jobs by Industry on home page for a faster job browsing experience - Added an Advance Search page for more refined search - Users can Manage their complete profile from the app itself, enabling them to keep profile updated and get better jobs - Users can Save & Searches Jobs and also get the list of applied jobs from server. These all are accessible from the Menu page - Integrated Inbox. This is one place where you get all the information about happenings in your account and activity. Events like recruiter contacts, job apply actions, career services updates etc, all come in once place for you.  - Added support of MENU option for ICS based devices in which the hard menu button has been removed. - Quick and Easy option to find and apply jobs from search result page. - Easy job apply option for your recommended jobs. - Quick job apply for your saved jobs - Easily retrieve your TimesJobs credential with Forgot Password implementation - Access information about all Similar Jobs from Description View - Enhanced Mobile Experience for seamless interactions throughout the App - Manage your Password within the App itself - Have Job Results Sorted by Relevancy or by Date - Contact Us directly to Improve your Resume for better Job Opportunities - Improved Layout and Design for Easier Navigation - Minor Bug Fixes to improve Stability and Performance - Track all Job Postings by Date - Get more results in Similar Jobs section - Now get more Matching Jobs - Swipe to get the Next Job Details - Enhance your Resume with our Career Services straight from your Mobile - Get Instant Job Notifications on your Mobile by creating an Alert based on your criteria We shall keep adding new features to the application which make your job search more productive and less time consuming. Please send your feedbacks and feature requests for our app to momshad.khan@timesgroup.com

description: OhMyGif is a great gif player that will make your free time even more enjoyable with the funniest animated gifs! Discover its features: - Gallery constantly updated: brand new gifs everyday. - *Rate, comment and share gifs with your friends. - Top Gallery: Don't miss the best rated gifs of the week, the month or ever! - *Prioritize new gifs over those already viewed. - Filter gifs by categories. - *Manage Your Favorites: Save your preferred gifs and see them whenever you want. - *Try to beat all our challenges: The more you unlock the more awards you win. - Check the rankings to discover which users have the highest scores on OhMyGif and try to do better than them. - Download in mp4 or gif format those animations you like the most. - Move to SD support ... and much much more! *Some features require free user registration. Podcast applications are too complicated. YAPP is a simple Holo-themed and modern podcast player for Android. Features: - Automatically check for and downloads new episodes of your favorite podcasts every night while you are sleeping. - Lockscreen audio controls. (for supported versions of Android) - Bluetooth headset integration. - Works great with no internet connection. (as long as you have downloaded episodes in advance!) This is version 1.0. I have used YAPP on my daily commute (20 minutes each way) every single day for the last 4 months - but that does not mean there won't be bugs. Please reach out to me if you find anything that impedes your ability to consume podcasts.
release_text: - YAPP now requires at least Android 4.0.0 - YAPP is now using a lighter theme. - Interactive playback controls in notification (play/pause/skip/stop) - Playback notification only shows when app is in the background - Improved episode download. Manage your downloads from the Downloads app on the device. - Updates to support Android 4.4 Kitkat - Handle podcasts that do not have descriptions. - Increased the height of the mini player to be easier to tap

description: لك سيدتي برنامج متكامل يحوي العديد من الصور لأقسام الموضة، والمكياج، والتسريحات للشعر، و الأحذية والحقائب، والاكسسوارات وغيرها الكثير لجمالك وأناقتك، للمرأة العربية الأنيقة الصور محدثة بشكل دائم يمكنك حفظ أي صورة أو مشاركتها مباشرة انتظرونا فالقادم أحلى تفخر بتواصلكم واقتراحاتكم

GolfCompanion is a mobile golf application with scorecard functionality and GPS map support. It provides you the same functionality as a Golf GPS. At the same time it is a digital scorecard (stableford) with many nice features for golf statistics. You can enter your golf score and golf statistics during play in our electronic golf scorecard (stableford). You can upload rounds to OOBGolf oobgolf.com, fore.nu, 36p.se, facebook and your email. GolfCompanion has a course database with 20 000 courses ! You can keep golf score and golf stats of up to 4 golf players. Keeps all the stats for all your golf rounds. Yard support in the GPS map. Golf is easier with a golf companion. GolfCompanion is the only Android application you need whenever wherever you play golf. It does keep scores, calculate handicap & statistics, GPS and more. Besides that it also allows you to download course information and upload/share your results to oobgolf, facebook, fore.nu, 36p.se and email. Functionality: Golf Course database - Download courses from our database containing more than 20000 courses. - Internal course editor to create new course or edit existing - Upload new and/or updated courses Golf Scorecard - Keep golf scores, handicap for 4 players at a time - Enter fairway hits - Get statistics on fairway hits, GIR and average puts Golf GPS Map - View current position on hole using map and GPS - View current distance to flag - Measure arbitrary distance point-to-point on map - Both metric and yards Golf Round storage - Store rounds in application and get total statistics on all played rounds - Upload round to facebook, email, oobgolf.com, fore.nu and 36p.se
release_text: Lollipop adaptions. Fixing upload of rounds

description: Chronos (Ancient Greek: Χρόνος, "time," also transliterated as Khronos or Latinized as Chronus) is the personification of Time in pre-Socratic philosophy and later literature. CHRONOS CLOCK WIDGET is named after the Greek God of Time and has 14 Clocks not just to make your Android Device Beautiful, but to act as an Amulet (A Lucky Charm) to bring luck. We live in a colorful world. Most of the colors have feelings and emotions associated with them and each color has association with a specific day of the Week and the Planet which rules that day. Chronos Clock widget has 2 Analog Clocks representing each day of the week, designed with the Colors matching that specific day, to bring positive energies from the right combination. #MONDAY - WHITE OR YELLOW Monday is the day of the Moon and The color of the day is White or Yellow symbolizing Purity, Wholesomeness and Sacred Rituals. #TUESDAY - RED Tuesday is the day of Planet Mars and the color of the day is Red symbolizing Sacrifice, Sex and Earth #WEDNESDAY - GREEN Wednesday is the day of Planet Mercury and the color of the day is Green symbolizing Fertility, Renewal and Wealth #THURSDAY - ORANGE OR YELLOW Thursday is the day of Planet Jupiter and the color of the day is Yellow and Orange symbolizing Enlightenment, Creativity and Shyness #FRIDAY - WHITE OR BLUE Friday is the day of Planet Venus and the color of the day is Blue and white symbolizing Purity, Mystery, Nobility and Tranquility #SATURDAY - BLACK OR VIOLET Saturday is the day of Planet Saturn and the color of the day is Black or Violet symbolizing Power, Creativity and Artistic Talent #SUNDAY - PINK OR ORANGE Sunday is the day of the Sun and the color of the day is Orange or Pink symbolizing Adventure, Change and Love
Create your demotivational memes easily in 2 simple steps, and share it with your friends.

✔ 47 knots in four categories ✔ Easy-to-follow instructions ✔ Tablet support ✔ Favorites support ✔ Eagle eye mode ✔ Two different themes: Black and Light ✔ Removable Ads Happened in summer of 2011. I was fishing and I had to tie a knot, which I used a very long time ago. Ok, no panic, “there is an app for that”, so I’ve checked the Android market, but I was quite disappointed, as I could not find such app, which would gave step-by-step, easy-to-follow instructions with good photos. So I’ve made this app. That’s it. This application illustrates how to make the most popular fishing knots, categorized in 4 chapters: line, hook, misc and boating knots. Step-by-step instructions help anyone to master those. Line knots • Tying loops: Simple loop, Bight, 3-turn loop • Stop knots: Multi-wrap stop knot, Figure of eight stop knot, Uni stop knot • Dropper loops and leaders: Butterfly loop, Dropper loop, Surgeon’s knot, Alpin, Linfit • Joining leader to loop: Joining loops 1-2, Quick joining to loop • Line to line: Albright, Blood and Fishermans knot Hook knots • Spade end hooks: Domhof, Needle knot, Snelling • Knotless knot • Eyed hooks: Crawford, Herkules, Trilene • Fly or/and eyed hooks: Duncan, Mörrum, Orvis • Drop shot knot • Palomar knot • WF knot Misc knots • Knots for swivels and snap locks: Clinch, Hangman’s knot, Sling knot • Not-a-knot • Arbour knots • Rapala knot • Universal knots: Rebeck, Kentauri, Pitzen Boating knots • Bowline, Anchor knot, Sliding knot, Double hitch, Cleat knot and Clove hitch This app is free, but Ad supported. This application was made based on series of articles on haldorado.hu site with the permission of the site owners and the author of the content, Róbert Balogh. Translation was made by Róbert, also.
release_text: Version 5.3.2 • Bug fixes • Android library updates

Choose from a community of talented, creative freelancers in 120 categories, from all over the world. Find whatever you're looking for quickly with our smart search and category navigation - Never miss a message or order update again, with real-time push notifications - Direct and instant access to sellers with user-generated feedback and quality ratings - Increase efficiency and get things done on the go by delivering Gigs directly from the app. - Create and edit Gigs, respond to customers in real time and adapt based on demand. - Track the status of your Gigs, withdrawals and view revenues, allowing for complete control of your business, regardless of location Download the Fiverr app for Android today and get all the Gigs you need—all in your pocket. Hello kids! Ozzy Games Studio has a new kids game for you and it's full of different kinds of fun games! This is a game package we've prepared for you, it's both fun and educative for you. You can play these game with your friends and family, too. These games are very helpful for the developement of motor skills of children from age 3 to 8. In this game package, there're 10 different games with over 10 levels in each: Pattern Game: In this game, you need to follow a pattern and figure out what's coming next. Hidden Animal Game: In this game, you need to find the hidden animals in the picture. Occupations Game: Take a look at the person in the picture. Can you tell their jobs just by looking at their clothes? Tidy-Up Game: We all know you don't like to tidy up your room but we believe you will very much enjoy doing this task in this game. Costume Game: These kids are ready for Halloween way before its time. Can you guess what they're all dressed up as? Labyrinth Game: In this game, you need to follow the right path and help the character reach its destination. A princess heading to a castle, or a bee heading to the beehive. Puzzle Game: In this game, you will be asked to complete the picture by using the puzzle pieces on the side of the screen. Catch -The-Fruit Game: It's raining fruits! You need to catch as many fruits as possible, but, beware of the bugs, they're very sneaky. Fun With Numbers: In this game, you need to work with numbers a little. You will be asked to do basic math, like adding and substracting. When you find the right answer, don't forget to pick the apple with the answer on it. Fishing Game: In this game, you need to catch the fish shown in the picture. With so many games and levels, you won't be able to stop playing this game! Features: ***All levels and games for FREE ***Colorful and HD graphics. ***Dubbed levels for little kids. ***Unlimited play time. ***Little kids can play without help, as the games are easy to understand. ***Fun and educational games. ***Helpful for kids who want to boost their motor skills. We hope you enjoy our game!

description: Make offers on farm equipment, fine art, motor vehicles, classic cars and more with KY Auctions, the premier auction app that connects you to auction sales and auctioneers throughout the entire state of Kentucky! Auctions for real estate, storage, land, paintings, homes for sale, collectables and more are available through this easy to use sales finder. If there’s an auction in Kentucky, you’ll find it with KY Auctions! KY Auctions is a leading bidding app that allows you to connect to auctioneers and collectors and make bids online, straight from your phone! Our app lets you search the entire state of Kentucky for a sale with a press of a finger. Auction time is all the time! Make offers in the bidding app for live auctions. • Auction access, instantly. Bid on an auction item right from your phone! • Auction notifications keep you up to date. • Online auctions available for farm equipment, motor vehicles, property and more. Once you find what you like you can start bidding from there. • Buying, selling and trading are easy when you can do it in person or online! Collect antiques and more – It’s easy to find antiques for sale! • Antiques and collectables can be found around your location through live auction map. • Auctioneers and auction types can be tracked via your favorites list to keep track of what you’re looking for. Make offers in live auctions today! • Auctions wherever you are. With the live auction map, you can find an auction nearby. • Get auction times to plan your schedule. Be notified when and where your chosen auction will be held. - View photos of what you’re leaving offers for. Auction access to 20+ categories! Make offers on anything! - Online Auctions - Real Estate - Estate Auction - Personal Property - Motor vehicles - Classic cars - Homes for sale - Land for sale - Car buying - Farms - Antiques and Collectables - Livestock - Produce - Farm Equipment - Paintings and fine art - Knives - Guns - Coins - School District Surplus - Classic books - Government Surplus - Foreclosures - Bankruptcy - Chancery Court Auctions - Benefit Auction Estate sales finder helps you find your ideal estate! • Property finder – KY Auctions offers an estate sales finder to help you find where the nearest estate is located. • Estate for sale is one of many specific categories that KY Auctions offers in their auction categories lists. • Auction times listed! You can view the date and time when the auction is taking place! • Maps and driving directions for when you want to check out the location yourself. KY Auctions upholds a standard of authenticity and legitimacy. Auctions on KY Auctions are run by licensed and trained auctioneers who review merchandise from collectors for you at their designated auction sites, so you know you’ll be buying, selling and trading the real deal. Auctioneers offer assurance that others don’t. • Buying feels secure when each item is personally authenticated to be legitimate and fairly priced. From classic cars to farm equipment, our auctioneers know how to fairly price what they’re selling • Auctioneers available at the tap of a finger. Contact any of our hundreds of professionally licensed auctioneers if you have questions or concerns. • KY Auctions is one of the best buying and selling tools in the auction and sales industry! KY Auctions makes it easy to search all of Kentucky for the best purchases. MagicPlan creates inside maps. It measures your rooms and draws your floor plan just by taking pictures. Simply add objects, annotations, and attributes to create an inside map. You can then share your map for free with any MagicPlan user, or pay to get it in PDF, JPG, PNG, SVG, DXF, and CSV formats, as well as publish an INTERACTIVE MAP on the web. With MagicPlan, EVERYONE CAN CREATE AN INSIDE MAP IN JUST A FEW MINUTES. • Downloaded by more than 7 MILLIONS fans. MagicPlan is the ideal app for Real Estate Agents, Craftsmen, Adjusters, Firemen, Architects, Home Inspectors, Interior Designers, Small Businesses, Furniture Retailers and many more. MagicPlan is not another floor plan drawing application: • No need to measure; • No need to draw; • No need to move furniture; • No need for expertise. What’s free: MagicPlan is free to download and use on the device. Sharing maps with another MagicPlan user is also free. What’s not free: - Certain objects are locked - Getting PDF + JPG + PNG + SVG + Interactive Web Site + DXF + CVS - Commercial usage Purchasing options: - Buy: Purchase one Property Map at a time for $2.99. - Subscription: While your subscription is active enjoy an unlimited usage for $9.99/month. MagicPlan Cloud: Store your floor plans on the cloud. COMPATIBILITY • Android 4.0 and above • Room Capture requires a GYROSCOPE MagicPlan technology is based upon a multiple patent technology technology leveraging the gyroscope. Terms of use: http://www.sensopia.com/english/legal/tindex.html Privacy policy: http://www.sensopia.com/english/legal/ppindex.html

Automatically detects and connects to free, public or not properly secured Wi-Fi networks with Internet access. Tests if free Internet connection is really available. Works Offline. Just move around and let this application to explore networks in range. You will be notified when a hotspot with free Internet connection is found. Application shows network security details and have sensitive signal quality measurement. Observing the signal strength graph will guide you to the perfect spot for surfing the internet at the highest speed. We are constantly improving algorithms for analyzing wireless networks and wifi radio handling, to make sure that if there is a free wi-fi network nearby, you will find it and connect to the internet at high speed. This application is an excellent choice for tablets without 3G/Lte modem and phones with limited data transfer plans. It is also very useful abroad, you can save your roaming data transfer or mobile prepaid. There are millions of access points around the world which you can connect to. You can find it almost everywhere, in big housing estates, malls, shopping centers, galleries, near restaurants, hotels, schools, city halls, trains, buses, at airports, in parks, maybe even your neighbors have poorly secured wifi. Please note that this is not a WiFi password breaker, there is no algorithm that deals with modern security protocols like WPA2. It does not perform WPS PIN recovery either.

Ginger Mail is an exclusive new email client application for MS Exchange. The users can manage their corporate email accounts more user-friendly and effectively. We designed Ginger Mail with simplicity in mind so that you can go anywhere in this application very easily. We have developed Ginger Mail from the scratch and it is not based on any other email client in the market. Users can share almost any photo(s) or files through this application with share option.We are working hard to introduce more features. Note:- Please make sure that EWS(Exchange Web Services) is enabled on your Exchange server(By default EWS is enabled on Exchange server, only few companies disable EWS access). Push notification only supports Office 365, Microsoft Exchange 2010 and above. Limited Period Offer **** The Price is inclusive of all taxes ***** If you are having any login issues, feel free to contact us through swiftmail4u@gmail.com [Features] - Direct Push & pull notification support. - Fully functional Calendar. - Contacts Sync. - Conversation View. - Favorite folders - Smart Folder view - Rich-Text Editor - Search Contacts(GAL) - Widgets - Material design - Themes - Ginger Mail uses built-in Calender of OS. - Ability to Search mails quickly - Move to folder option. - Swipe to Quick Actions - Ability to mark flags and clear flags. - User credentials stored in encrypted format. - Unified Unread,Attachments and Flagged filters. - Supports Exchange 2010 and Office 365. - Contacts(GAL) retrieved from the server while compose mails. - Multiple folder support with rules. - Multiple attachment support. - Inline images download support. - Clean and beautiful user interface. - Pinch to zoom for HTML/Text messages. - Full HTML support. - Multiple selection for deleting and marking flags. - Ability to select, copy and paste. - Delete mail remotely - Uses HTML signature from Exchange OWA. - Draft mail support. - Settings for the ringtones, Sync options,Custom Signature, Peak Time and LED. Ginger Mail doesn't supports Exchange 2003 and 2007. For Office 365 users: Go to manual setup > Domain\name : \ name@yourdomain.com or \ name@yourdomain.onmicrosoft.com ( domain name should be blank) Server URL: outlook.office365.com Select Accept all certificates option Port No : 443 Ginger Mail simply works like Outlook and OWA client.

Folder Lock® lets you password-protect your personal files, photos, videos, documents, contacts, wallet cards, notes and audio recordings in Android Phones. The app comes with a clean and pleasant interface. You can also transfer files from Gallery, PC/Mac, Camera and Internet browser. Award Winning Concept : **From the developers of award winning Folder Lock 7**. “Editor’s choice on PC Magazine”. “5 stars on CNET.com”. “Ranked #1 encryption software on TopTenReviews.com”. Password-Protect Sensitive Photos & Videos: Import photos & videos to lock them in seconds, or take secured images and record videos directly from Folder Lock’s user interface. Secret Audio files: Prevent others from discovering your secretive audio files, be it private conversations or business secrets. Lock-Down Sensitive Documents: Confidently lock-down sensitive documents such as bank statements, tax returns, company spreadsheets and other off-the-record files. Secured Wallets: Boldly save your sensitive details from credit cards, bank accounts, health card, passport and other confidential information by creating secured wallets. Record Secret Voice Memos: Feel free to record your secret thoughts with Secret Voice Recorder. You can also listen to your recordings with its built-in audio player. Private Contacts: Create a list of confidential contacts, send secret-group SMS to your secret contacts right within Folder Lock’s secure interface. Cloud Backup: Never lose your secured files and folders ever again. With cloud backup feature, you can regularly backup your data. Three Login Types: You have the option to setup a password, PIN or pattern as your primary access lock. Data Recovery: You’ll never have to worry about losing your data in Folder Lock. It’s built in data recovery feature can help users retrieve deleted files and folders. WI-FI File Transfer: Using your WI-FI connection, you can securely transfer your sensitive files and folders between different devices. OTHER SECURITY FEATURES: Stealth Mode (Hide icon) hides the app’s icon, prevents shoulder-surfers from discovering Folder Lock on your phone. Decoy Mode (fake user) Create a fake profile to prevent authorized user from accessing your real Folder Lock user-account. Panic Switch (Shake, Flick or Place your palm on the screen) Switches to another app immediately with just a shake, flick or placing your palm on the screen. Secure Browser you can download pictures and videos from Folder Lock’s secure browser, leaves no traces of browsing history. Hack Attempt Monitoring Folder Lock automatically snaps images of intruders with time stamp. FEATURES: • Protect private photos • Hide sensitive videos and pictures • Password-protect secret audio • Lock down important documents • Write secure notes • Record voice recordings and memos secretly • Import Saved Contacts • Create Contact Groups • Secret Contacts Group multiple SMS Secure Browser (leaves no traces and privacy enabled) • Download files from Browser Import files from • Gallery • SD Cards • PC / MAC • Secure Browser Settings and Options • Hacker Deterrents • Decoy Password (Fake Password) • Brute force attack prevention • Takes snaps of unauthorized login attempts • Logs unauthorized login attempts • Deterrents on multiple invalid login attempts • Backup Password in case of forgotten password Folder Lock provides security to your data, mainly when you share your mobile with somebody else and you want to hide some personal information. Folder Lock for Android Phone is the extension of the popular Folder Lock for Windows Desktop. For more information you can visit http://www.newsoftwares.net .

Build and serve sundaes on the go with this brand-new version of Papa's Freezeria, with gameplay and controls reimagined for Android phones! You've just started a relaxing summer job at an oceanfront ice cream shop, but things get hectic when all of Papa Louie's customers arrive on the island! You'll need to whip up delicious Freezer sundaes by pouring ice cream, adding mixables and syrups, blending sundaes, adding whipped cream and toppings, and don't forget the cherry on top for a perfect summertime treat! You'll need to multitask between each area of the restaurant, with new controls designed to work just right in the palm of your hand. Head to the Order Station to watch for customers waiting in the lobby. Switch to the Build Station to combine ice cream and mixables for each sundae. Jump to the Mix Station to mix sundaes until they're blended just right. Hop to the Top Station to pour whipped cream and toppings before serving the sundae to your picky customers. Each Station is a hands-on experience, where you'll need to drag, swipe, and tap your way through the sundae-building process. Keep your customers happy to earn points and level up. As your level rises, you'll unlock new toppings for the shop, and new customers will start to visit the Freezeria! A well-crafted sundae also earns you tips, which you can spend on upgrades and decorations for the lobby! ** NEW FOR PAPA'S FREEZERIA TO GO** Papa's Freezeria To Go is redesigned and reimagined for smaller screens, so your fingers won't get in the way of the action! CONTROL WITH YOUR THUMBS - You'll switch stations using buttons in the corners of the screen, perfect for your thumbs. You can also use buttons in the top corners to quickly switch Order Tickets, and you can view all of your Order Tickets in a zoomed-in mode for easy reading. BUILD STATION - We've completely redesigned the Build Station for smaller screens, so you can quickly and easily pour ice cream and mixables like a master! The Pour Button and Bonus Meter are moved to the side and sized just right for your thumb, so you can watch the meter and tap at the right time without any fingers blocking your view. When it's time to choose a mixable or a syrup, the entire screen is filled with large buttons so you can easily tap the correct item. MIX STATION - We've fine-tuned the Mix Station upgrades to work even better on small touch screens. Once you purchase the Blend Alarm upgrades, you can drag these large alarms and snap them onto any blender. Booster Buttons are also large and easy to press, and you can even use multi-touch to boost multiple blenders at once! TOP STATION - We've brought back the Topping Bin carousel from "Papa's Burgeria To Go!", which lets you top sundaes in a brand-new way! Swipe the carousel of Topping Bins to choose the item you want to use, then grab the sundae cup to start pouring toppings evenly across the sundae. You can also tap a button to switch to placeable items like cherries and cookies. And with full multi-touch support, you can keep one finger sliding the bins and another tapping on the cup below, so you'll have those sundaes finished in no time! NEW INGREDIENTS - We've added a ton of new ingredients that can't be found in the classic or HD versions of the game, including mixables, syrups, whipped cream flavors, and other toppings that you'll unlock as you play the game. There's over 70 unique ingredients for you to discover! **GAME FEATURES** - Hands-on ice cream shop in the Papa Louie universe - All new controls and gameplay designed for smaller screens - Multi-task between building, mixing, and topping - Shop to buy upgrades using your in-game tips - 85 customers to unlock with unique orders - Challenging Closers and Food Critic - 120 in-game achievements to earn **NOTE FOR TABLET USERS** Papa's Freezeria To Go is designed especially for smaller screens. If you're looking for large-screen gameplay, check out "Papa's Freezeria HD" for tablets!
release_text: - Added 5 new customers! - Fixed a bug that allowed you to serve unblended sundaes - Fixed a bug in training if you tried to skip blending the sundae - Fixed an error that could occur when pouring toppings - Improved support for Intel x86 devices
