doorbl is shutting down October 31st 2015. Sorry for the inconvenience. Don't hesitate with contacting support at doorbl dot com if you have any questions in that regard. Not at home? Not able to open the door right now? Let the persons outside either get in direct touch with you or leave a message. By taking advantage of NFC (Near Field Communication), QR codes (Quick Response codes) and the fact that everyone carries around their mobile device, you can now answer the door even when you're not at home or are unable to come to the door. This is the doorbell of the future. Go to http://doorbl.com and "print" your doorbell. The person outside either touches your NFC tag or scans the QR code on your front door and leaves his/her phone number. You'll be instantly notified and you can choose to call back.
release_text: doorbl is shutting down October 31st 2015. 1.0.0 Bugfix: App crashed when writing NFC tag on Android API level 10 (Gingerbread). Re-designed popup screen. Now also non-touch devices can download the app. 0.9.3 Minor changes. New icon. 0.9.2 Initial release to Google Play

description: The Jewish Chronicle, the world’s oldest and most trusted independent Jewish newspaper, is now available as you’ve never seen it before. You can read it cover-to-cover in an attractive, easy-to-use format that includes all the news, features, comment and cutting-edge analysis for which it is renowned. Download the app and take advantage of 30 days FREE access. After that, you can opt to take out a subscription for one, three or 12 months using the Google Play in-App purchase method. FREE 30-day access to The Jewish Chronicle. WHY IT’S WORTH IT - Read the JC on the move - wherever you are in the world. - Store, access and search back issues. - Download it to read offline (entire issues or individual pages). - Use the zoom tool for clearer reading of selected articles. - Flip your device and read the newspaper as a double-page spread or full-screen single page. - Tap the page selector to choose a specific page for fast navigation. - Search by keywords to find recent content. - Share articles via e-mail, Twitter and Facebook. And remember, the newspaper in its entirety is updated every Thursday. SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS - £4.99 per month. - £12.99 quarterly - £44.99 12 months - Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. - No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. - The Jewish Chronicle reserves the right to alter the pricing at any point.
release_text: - Several updates and performance improvements - Option to subscribe to an auto renewing subscription through the app

description: IMPORTANT: Shares require hosting on the server. We are offering 5 free shares, afterwards you can buy new tickets. Photo 360° is the first application on Google Play which lets users take fantastic 360° panoramic photos without taking multiple pictures or any other difficult manipulation. Record the environment around you and capture both the image and sound all in one revolution. Thanks to its simple use, Photo 360° immortalizes your best moments anywhere at any time by taking “magical” 360 degree photos. Three kinds of 360° pictures can be taken turning clockwise: 1- 360 degree Panorama: You will obtain in a few seconds a full 360 degree panorama (without any discrepancy problems) by just holding your device. 2- 360 degree object/person photo: Get a 360°view of an object (or person) simply by turning around. 3- “Behind you” photo (available for front-facing camera devices): Create an amazing picture that will show the world behind you thanks to the front camera of the device (through the app). Features: • Share your photos on Facebook and Twitter • Possibility to view your photos played with Flash (integrating the sound sequence) via the Photo 360° Web Viewer. • Possibility to take landscape photos. • GPS location record • Possibility to send the photo’s URL (once uploaded) to a friend by email. IMPORTANT: Please note that without good lighting photos can often be blurred or be difficult to capture. For high quality images we recommend outdoor areas. Visit our website: http://www.amamobile.com Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AMAmobile Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/AMobileA Subscribe to our YouTube’s channel: http://www.youtube.com/amamobile

description: The bay of Balaklava on the Black Sea is impressively locked up between mountains. This is equally an inspiration and model for this board game. Game stones are locked up between others here and sometimes in such a way that no move is possible.. Rules of game: Five locust beans are put on game board alternately. Then players put coins on boards, also alternately, under one condition: The coin must be in the neighbourhood of the last put coin (above, under, to left of, to right of it). The player who puts the last coin wins. More features: ★ multiple difficulty levels ★ one or two player mode ★ choose between board sizes of 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 and 7x7 This app does not fetch advertisements from internet, only internal ads of the app creator are presented. Please upgrade to premium version to support this project.
A simple yet addictive game which tests your speed and unlocking prowess of iPhone. WARNING: This game is very addictive! Remember to water the plants and feed the kids.

"YOOM manga" is the perfect Manga comic viewer for small devices such as tablets and smartphones. It's intelligent frame detection technology brings you a perfect Manga comic reading experience. (1) Zoom In and Out "YOOM manga" frame detection engine perform automated zooming in and out. Each frame scrolls smoothly in the playback mode. without manual panning and zooming, You can enjoy large images in the small screen of the mobile phone. (2) Multi-Device, Multi-Screen Resolution YOOM manga supports both tablets and smartphones. It's user interfaces are optimized depending on the screen size and orientation. (3) Automated Frame-By-Frame Reading You can read next page continuously without touching or swiping. YOOM provides you a fully automated frame-by-frame reading. Mirroring your device's display on your TV, you can enjoy a perfect manga reading experience. (4) ZIP Compressed JPEG Images "YOOM manga" is specialized in manga images which you have scanned by yourself. Images should use a compressed format such as JPEG or PNG, with a serial number, be packaged as a zip format file. http://www.e-hearts.net

description: Welcome to the first entry of Brass Monkeigh Apps to the Android market! Anyone with an iOS device is familiar with the helpful tools Brass Monkeigh Apps designs for gamers, and now our great apps are making their way to Android! If you have ever played Black Ops 2, you know that your total career deaths are no longer displayed in the barracks or on ELITE. This app will show you your total deaths, as well as help you improve your overall K/D ratio by showing you how many more kills you need to improve your ratio. For more information about Brass Monkeigh Apps, check out www.BrassMonkeigh.com
release_text: In version 1.0: The app will tell you: - Your overall career deaths - How many kills you need to bump up your K/D Ratio to the next 0.01, 0.10, and 1.00 spots - Every time you engage an enemy, what percent of the time to you win the gunfight and what percent of the time do you lose

This is the android port of the 2048 game made by Gabriele Cirulli https://github.com/gabrielecirulli/2048 How to play: - Swipe(Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. - Two same number tiles touch and merge into 2x one tile. - You win the game when the 2048 tile created. ** The survival of the Gizzle’s is in your hands ** A retaliation mission is served when the Helmet Hero’s decide to kamikaze into the evil ‘Goots’, who are holding the Gizzle’s captive in a desperate bid to take over their unique worlds! Using simple mouse controls, you will need to aim the Helmet Hero’s at the Goot’s to wipe them out. Once you have cleared the path of all danger, a switch will appear which must be pressed to release the Gizzle’s. You will need to fight across 5 environments in a huge 50 levels. Be warned though, you will need timing, precision and skill to overcome all the defenses they have in place to prevent your attacks! Good Luck, step up and become a HELMET HERO.

description: Ready to test your problem-solving and screen tapping skills to beat increasingly complex (but fun!) obstacle courses? Then you’ll love the maze challenges in Cheese Hunter, where you must reach different cheese rewards without touching any walls or traps. You see, Roger the Mouse loves to hunt cheese in Mr. Smith’s house every time he’s hungry. Just guide him -- step by step -- to the tasty cheese on each level of Mr. Smith’s storage room. As the adventure proceeds, it gets harder and harder to grab each cheese. Think wisely for the best use of your time! And be careful not to collide with obstacles and walls -- each collision costs you one life. And you must pay special attention to the moving obstacles Mr. Smith has built to protect his cheese from you -- you have to act FAST to get past or you'll be cut off. Keep tapping the screen to navigate the best and fastest course you can. The farther away you tap, the quicker your mouse will go to that location. So sprint when you’ve got the room to run. And tiptoe when you’re moving in tight spaces! Start with Easy and advance to Average and then Hard. Pass every level to become a master cheese hunter!
release_text: - Fixed so that purchases removed adsd - Fixed crash bugs

description: Get your mighty mallet because it’s rescue time! Test your reflexes and do your best to save the pet hamsters from the laboratory. Have fun with this rendition of the classic whack-a-mole game and see how many points you are able to score. Play now! ++ Can you rescue them all? ++ HOW TO PLAY • Hit the balls with your mallet to release the hamsters • Do NOT hit the bombs • … that’s it! Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

Find your caravan using this stylish and simple to use app. The Find My Caravan app provides compass, radar & Google Maps displays to guide you back to your caravan! To use the app simply press the target button whilst standing next to your caravan - the app will capture your location using GPS coordinates via the phone's GPS sensors. Once the app has captured your location it will store the location coordinates so you can close the app you should wish. Upon wanting to return to your caravan simply launch the app and press the locate button. In locate mode the app will provide several displays which can be selected using the slider in the centre of the screen. You can use either the compass, Google Map or radar display. All are updated in real time. We hope you enjoy using the app and welcome any feedback you may have.

"Clash of Castles" is a fascinating strategic game. At the start of the game you will have a small castle and a tiny army at your disposal. Upgrade your castle, gather a huge army and wipe the opponent out of your land. Features: - 2 campaigns with 40 levels and 3 difficulties - 5 different buildings and 2 spells - cloud leaderboards - addictive gameplay "Clash of Castles" is absolutely free! Friendly interface, professional graphics and animation, interesting plot will dip you into the atmosphere of fascinating battles and will bring you hours of addictive gameplay! What are you waiting for? Time to fight!

Unique, first in Russia FIELD mobile guide to amphibians of Northern Eurasia: 41 most prevalent species, each with photo and drawing of male and female (if different), typical identification features and text descriptions and voices. It is easy and fun to identify species using 9 determination morphological characters with 3-8 values in each of them. Application consists from 6 main parts: Guide, Atlas, Textbook, Manual, Systematic Tree (with class, family and genus descriptions) and Quiz. The application works without Internet connection, you can use it directly in nature if you see or have the unknown object in your hands. Using the Guide you can narrow the number of possible species to 2-3 and then compare your object with their images and descriptions in the Atlas.

If the widgets are not appearing on 4.1+ (Jellybeen) devices? Please email me for easy fix. *You must have UCCW installed on your phone to use this theme. Download UCCW for free from the Play Store.. Please support my work with a 5 star rating. I have many more amazing themes coming your way! This theme has been tested on the Galaxy Note 2 and the Galaxy S3 and works perfectly using Nova Launcher Prime. It will also work on many other devices but have yet to be tested. I will post when it has been confirmed to be working on other devices. Don't want to take the risk? Check back regularly for an updated device selection. Please email me with any issues rather than posting them in the review section of the Play store. Thank you. This is a single screen theme with all the goodies that the average user uses. You have your ************* Tutorials: Note.. This may look difficult, but it really isn't. I wrote this for anyone who has never touched UCCW or a custom launcher. Every step is here. Nova Launcher Prime setup: Press menu on your phone Press Nova settings >desktop>desktop grid. Set rows to 6 and columns to 6. back out.. >Width margin. Set to none. back out.. >Height margin. Set to none. back out.. Make sure "show shadows" is unchecked > "home screens" and remove all but one screen. back out.. >"scroll effect" set to none. back out.. >Wallpaper scrolling. Set to off. back out.. Uncheck "infinate scroll". Scroll to the bottom and open the "advanced" tab and check "resize all widgets". Back out to main menu >Dock. Uncheck "enable dock". back out.. >Look and feel. Uncheck "show notification bar". back out.. >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe up. Click "app drawer". >Gestures and buttons. >Swipe down. Click "expand notifications". Done. UCCW setup: After you download the theme... Clear your homescreen of any icons or widgets Long press your homescreen Select "widgets" Click on UCCW Click the 4x2 widget Find and click the first widget of this theme Touch the white hand After the widget appears, long press it Click "resize" and resize it so it spans the width of your screen. Repeat this process for the rest of the widgets. Once all the widgets are placed on the screen, rearrange them like the pictures. Done. Changing hotspots: If you mess anything up beyond simple repair just delete the widget and add it again. *Don't add the new widget through the UCCW editor as the widgets will not show up in the list. You must make a whole new widget by long pressing your home screen.* scroll to the bottom of the UCCW editor Click a hotspot and choose what you'd like to change it to. Once you're done editing... go back into your app drawer >UCCW >phone menu >Lock widgets (hotspot folders) >press "on". Enjoy your awesome screen! FAQ: How to change temperature units? Open the UCCW app in your app drawer >menu> check Celsius. Why does the skin not show up in the list? This is a Google related issue with some Jellybean devices. If you have this issue, email me. Ill send you a fix.

Want to share a file with a friend or a co-worker? Just tap their name, tap the file, and they have it! Any Send makes sharing files over wifi as easy and fast as it possibly can be. Just install Any Send on two Android phones, and you can send anything between them, at superfast wifi speeds. You can also send to Windows and Macs, get the free apps from http://getanysend.com/ Features: * Incredibly simple sharing. Just select the file, the person, and that's it! * Very fast sharing speeds powered by your local network, no internet required. * Background service sharing ability * Support for tons of file types: movies, audio, images, contacts, any file. * Custom designs for both landscape and portrait modes * Doesn't use your internet bandwidth, completely local WiFi sharing. ALSO ON * PC and Mac! http://getanysend.com/ COMING SOON: Android is first to get Any Send, an iOS version is coming soon! ## FEEDBACK Any Send is a new app and currently in beta, we are working hard to make it more awesome. Please send feedback to web-support@adylitica.com thanks for all your feedback and reports!

description: Pennsylvania Fishing Maps includes links to over 11,000 fishing Lakes, Rivers, and Reservoirs in the State of Pennsylvania. Each fishing location can be searched by name or by selecting a county and reviewing all lakes, rivers, reservoirs, and even wetlands in the area. Features: -Complete library of over 11,000 fishing locations (lakes, rivers, reservoirs and wetlands). -Fishing locations are searchable by name, or easily retrievable by clicking a county to see all lakes or other features in this geography. -Save a lake or river on your favorites list for easy access to your favorite fishing spots. -Create a journal entry for each fishing experience at a lake, river, stream, reservoir or wetland (swamp). -Can't remember a lake name, the app allows you with ease to review all lakes, rivers, reservoirs or swamps for counties in Pennsylvania. -Want to share your fishing experiences with your fishing buddies, with one simple click you can email or text (SMS) lake or river details with GPS data to friends. This is a must have app for all fishermen and fisherwomen who love to explore the great waters of Pennsylvania (PA).

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…. people used to watch television shows just on their television. While we have yet to master warp speed or time travel, Space is now fully upgraded for mobile viewing on phones, tablets, and other gizmos, so you can take your doctors, clones, and wolves with you wherever you go! Key Features: - On-demand selection of our biggest and best shows, including Orphan Black, Doctor Who, and Bitten - Wi-Fi and 3G/4G enabled Notes: - Cellular data (3G/4G/LTE) charges may apply for viewing video over a cellular network - Additional charges will obviously apply if viewing from another planet, dimension, or alternate reality

Анна Андреевна Ахматова — одна из известнейших русских поэтов XX века, писатель, литературовед, литературный критик, переводчик. Автор известных произведений "Реквием", "Мужество", "Земля" и пр. Основные возможности: - Приложение включает в себя практически все сочинения Ахматовой. - Настройка отображения: светлая/темная тема, ночной режим - Настройка размера шрифта - Быстрая публикация произведения в Facebook, Google+, Вконтакте, Gmail, Twitter, SMS. - Произведения известных отечественных и зарубежных писателей в одном приложении. Для загрузки текстов произведений используется Интернет-соединение. Anna Akhmatova - one of the most famous poets of the XX century Russian writer, literary critic, literary critic and translator. Author of famous works of "Requiem", "Courage", "Earth", etc. Key features: - The application includes almost all the works of Anna Akhmatova. - Setting the display: light / dark theme, night mode - Adjust the font size - Rapid publication of works in Facebook, Google+, FaceBook, Gmail, Twitter, SMS. - Works of famous domestic and foreign writers in a single application. To download the texts of works using the Internet connection.

description: Meditate easily with this elegantly simple App by Meditation Oasis™. Enjoy the deep relaxation, stress relief and benefits of meditation without prior experience. Simply Being has been developed by Richard and Mary Maddux, creators of the popular Meditation Oasis podcast. It allows you to choose from 4 meditation times and gives you to option to listen with or without music/nature sounds. You can also listen to the music or nature sounds alone. RECOMMENDED by THE NEW YORK TIMES, SELF MAGAZINE, YOGA JOURNAL and the HUFFINGTON POST. Medically reviewed and selected for "Best Meditation Apps of 2014" by HEALTHLINE.COM. Meditate easily with this elegantly simple App by Meditation Oasis™. Enjoy the deep relaxation, stress relief and benefits of meditation without prior experience. Simply Being has been developed by Richard and Mary Maddux, creators of the popular Meditation Oasis podcast. It allows you to choose from 4 meditation times and gives you to option to listen with or without music/nature sounds. You can also listen to the music or nature sounds alone. "Very relaxing and a good way to fall asleep." "...the best guided meditation I have ever found." "Extremely soothing music and voice really helps you relax." "My stress level has dropped, I have more patience, and I am more relaxed before going to bed." With this App you can: - Meditate easily as you are voice-guided step by step - Choose a meditation length of 5, 10, 15 or 20 minutes - Listen to the meditation with or without music/nature sounds - Listen to the music or nature sounds alone - Read instructions to support and enhance your meditation - Relax deeply and experience the present moment completely - Enjoy the benefits of meditation - Links to support on the Meditation Oasis website - Separate Volume Controls for voice and music/nature sounds The Simply Being meditation is useful for beginners and experienced meditators alike. _____________ Created by Mary Maddux, MS, HTP and Richard Maddux, best known for their popular Meditation Oasis podcast and and CDs. Mary and Richard bring over 30 years of meditation practice and teaching to the creation of their guided meditations and music. In addition to teaching meditation, Mary has worked in both conventional and alternative settings as a counselor and healing arts practitioner. Richard has played and composed music all of his life. His music is composed especially for meditation, relaxation and healing.

Expanding on the Dolch sight words, Dr. Edward B. Fry in 1996 created a new list of high frequency words (“Fry Words”). The Fry instant words are the most common words used in English ranked by order of frequency. Dr. Fry found that 25 words make up 1/3 of all words published, 100 words make up ½ of all words published and 300 words make up 65% of all written material. These high frequency words should be recognized instantly by young readers. The Fry words are helpful for adults learning English as a second language as well as for children. This app has 500 words divided into five levels and then divided into groups of twenty-five words, based on frequency of use and difficulty in a flash card setting. Features included: • The first 500 Fry Words • Words can be marked to the Review list (use the star to mark and menu to clear list) • The word is read out when the card is touched • Long press buttons to jump to start or end Paid ad-free version also available. Bugs or suggestions ? Please let us know through email.

Skyscanner compares millions of flights across hundreds of airlines- putting the world’s top travel deals at your fingertips. It’s quick and easy to find cheap flights with Skyscanner- the world’s top flight comparison app. With over 35 million downloads so far, our app is a must have for the savvy world traveller. Skyscanner saves you money- whether you’re looking for the cheapest flights for your summer holiday, or last minute flights for a spontaneous getaway. It only takes a few seconds to search for flights using Skyscanner. Our comprehensive flight checker includes high end flag carriers, charter flights, and the best of the budget airlines- giving you the greatest choice when it comes to cheap flights. Need to buy flight tickets on the go? With our app you can search for and book flights instantly from your smartphone. We show you the flights and when you’re ready to book we send you a direct link to the airline or travel agent. With Skyscanner there are no added fees- just cheap flights. No travel destination in mind? No problem. Our unique ‘Everywhere’ search function offers instant flight inspiration. Tell us when you want to fly and where you want to fly from, and we’ll do the rest. Our flight finder shows a list of available flights from your airport to destinations across the globe. Fast, flexible and free, there’s no doubt about it- Skyscanner is the best way to compare flights and get great travel deals, wherever you are. Features: ‘Everywhere’ search –Instant travel inspiration with a list of the cheapest flights from your nearest airport Filter results by price, cabin class, airline, and take-off and landing times Chart view: see prices across a whole week or month to find the best flight deals Available in over 30 languages Create a handy widget to display the latest flight prices for your previous searches

Pescuit Crap este un ghid Aventuri la pescuit, brandul media numarul 1 in pescuitul sportiv din Romania, ce contine detalii despre monturi, momeli, nade, fire, noduri, tehnici, sfaturi si multe secrete. Prima aplicatie romaneasca si totdodata cea mai cuprinzatoare aplicatie din lume dedicata exclusiv pescuitului la crap. Aplicatia acopera toate aspectele importante ale pescuitului la crap: realizarea si folosirea monturilor, noduri, alegerea carligelor si a montajelor de plumb, momeli si nade, lansete, mulinete, fire principale sau pentru forfac, agrafe si anouri, suporti si avertizori, componenta trusei, corturi si paturi, saltele de receptie, tehnici de nadire, tehnici de pescuit, sfaturi si secrete etc Singura aplicatie din lume care prezinta toata informatia esentiala practicarii pescuitului la crap. Avand aceasta aplicatie in mana orice novice isi poate constitui singur trusa, poate lega carligele si realiza monturile, poate alege singur nada si momeala. Pescarii mai avansati isi vor extinde arsenalul de cunostinte pentru a putea aborda mai eficace situatiile din teren. Specialistii in pescuitul la crap au scris-o. Monturi : Prezentam aplicabilitatea, componentele si modul de realizare pe pasi a unui numar generos de monturi si montaje, care acopera practic toate situatiile de pescuit: montura simpla fir de par, montura snowman fir combi, montura combi, montura blow-back, montura sir/inel de viermusi, montura D, montura 360, montura Zig, montura Chod și montura KD, Montura de pescuit pe suprafata la distanta/scurta, Montaj cu momitor pe segment de leadcore . Noduri: Principalele 9 tipuri de noduri folosite in pescuiul la crap: nodul fara nod, nodul clinch imbunatatit, nodul Albright etc. Nade si momeli : Toate tipurile principale de nade si momeli de la pelete si boiliesuri la seminte si larve de chironomide aplicabilitatea lor si principalii producatori. Carlige : Prezentarea principalelor tipuri de carlige pentru crap : curve shank, long shank, wide gape, choddy si curve long shank avand caracteristicile, aplicabilitatea si principalii producatori. Fire : Firele de forfac, fire camasa, fire textile suple, monofilamentul, fluorocarbonul, leadcore-ul, firele de inaintas sunt descrise avantajele si dezavantajele fiecaruia, unde este indicata folosirea lor, producatorii principali si preturile lor. Plumbi : Plumbii Grippa, plumbii de distanta vartej, plumbii de distanta in-line etc sint prezentati avand caracteristicile, avantajele, dezavantajele si aplicabilitatea lor. Lanseta : Tipurile de lansete folosite in pescuitul la crap, actiunea, puterea si lungimea, utilizarea lor, principalii producatori si preturile sint prezentate in aceasta sectiune. Mulineta : Principalele componente ale mulinetei de crap, ilustrate avand detalii fotografice si o sectiune despre caracteristicile mulinetei, preturi si producatori. Accesorii monturi : De la agrafe si anouri, clipsuri, crosete si opritoare de momeala, materiale solubile (PVA) si pasta de plumb pina la plute, penar si foarfeca, va prezentam toate accesoriile folosite in realizarea si pastrarea monturilor. Corturi, paturi si saci de dormit : Ce trebuie sa stim cand le cumparam, care sunt principalii producatori si intervalul de preturi. Tehnici de pescuit si de nadire : O sectiune foarte utila pe balta si in etapa de pregatire a partidei de pescuit. Sfaturi si secrete : A fost nevoie de multe insistente (si amenintari :)) pentru a scoate de la specialistii nostri sfaturile cele mai folositoare pescarilor obisnuiti. Urmati-le si veti avea succes! Aplicatia este un produs romanesc lansat si international sub marca Clear Fishing in limbile germana si engleza. Despre Aventuri la pescuit, brandul media numarul 1 in pescuitul sportiv din Romania, puteti afla mai multe vizitind www.aventurilapescuit.ro

Learning is Fun with BabyFirst Video: Educational TV BabyFirst Video is the safe and fun way for preschool children and toddlers to start learning and exploring! From the hit TV channel BabyFirst, BabyFirst Video provides hours of award-winning shows for your kids to enjoy. Created by experts in child development, education, and psychology , the #1 rated BabyFirst Video app is the perfect way for grown-ups to safely introduce their children to learning through electronic media. Choose from dozens of high-quality channels and hundreds of episodes designed to aid learning. With oodles of new shows added on a regular basis, the fun never stops with BabyFirst! Find or discover your favorite BabyFirst characters and cartoons: •  Harry the Bunny, Peekaboo, VocabuLarry, Tillie Knock Knock, Bonnie Bear, Hide and Seek, The Notekins and many more! ✰ Overview of the BabyFirst Video: Educational TV App Features •  Free to download •  Ad-free •  Child safe design: you control what your child sees •  Available in multiple languages •  Created by experts in child education ✰ BabyFirst Educational TV: Available in Seven Languages Both the video content and Parent Control module for BabyFirst Video Educational TV are available in the following languages: English (American and British), Spanish (Latin American and Castilian), French, Portuguese, and Mandarin. ♥ Protect Your Child with BabyFirst Video BabyFirst’s child-safe design provides a secure and educational platform for children to engage with electronic media. With the BabyFirst Video Parent Control module you decide what your little one watches, while the simple navigational interface means your children can play independently and safely. Children and grown-ups alike will love the BabyFirst cartoons and shows that are designed to entertain and educate in equal measure. What’s more, with a wealth of captivating channels to choose from, you will always be able to find something that makes learning fun and exciting.

description: Skateboard Party 2 brings all the fun of skateboarding to your mobile device allowing you to ride in 8 completely unique locations. Jump on your board, learn new moves and improve your skateboarding skills to land sick combos. Play with your friends using the new online multiplayer mode or challenge skaters from all over the world using the online leaderboards. Complete achievements, gain experience and upgrade your favorite skater. You can also customize your outfits, boards, trucks and wheels with real brands. HIGH DEFINITION Skateboard Party 2 includes next generation 3D graphics specially optimized for your mobile hardware to provide you with the best skateboarding experience. CAREER MODE Complete over 40 achievements to unlock new items and locations. Gain experience to upgrade your favorite skater’s attributes to perform better and achieve higher scores. FREE SKATE Practice and improve your skateboarding skills without any time constraints. ONLINE MULTIPLAYER Challenge your friends to a skateboard battle and let’s see who can land the baddest tricks! Share and brag your results with your friends on Twitter. MASSIVE SELECTION Select between 9 characters and customize each of them to your preference choosing your favorite gear. A massive collection of boards, trucks and wheels are available including items from Powell & Peralta, Bones, Golden Dragon and Tork Trux. LEARN TO SKATE Over 40 unique tricks to master and hundreds of combinations. Follow the tutorial to get started and progress as you go. Execute the craziest combos and trick sequences to rack up some impressive high scores, gain experience and make a name for yourself. GAME CONTROLLER Compatible with most game controllers available. CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS New fully customizable control system to configure your own button layout. Use the right or left handed control mode, select a control preset or create your own. Use the analog stick or accelerometer option as you wish. Adjust your truck tightness to change your steering sensitivity. LOADED WITH FEATURES •Supports all the latest generation devices and optimized for high resolution displays. •Online multiplayer mode to play against your friends or other skaters online. •New fully customizable control system. You can adjust everything! •Learn over 40 unique tricks and create hundreds of combinations. •Massive skateboard locations to ride including a trailer park, army base, shopping mall, ski resort, campus, funfair beach and a big open city. •Customize your skater or board with tons of exclusive content including outfits, boards, trucks and wheels from licensed brands. •Play often to gain experience and upgrade your skater’s attributes. •Share your results with your friends on Twitter. •Extended Soundtrack featuring songs from Voice of Addiction, Sink Alaska, Beta, Hitplay!, Moovalya, We Outspoken and Melodic in Fusion. •Ability to purchase experience points using in-app purchases. •Available in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese and Chinese SUPPORT: http://en.ratrodstudio.com/support/ VISIT US: http://ratrodstudio.com FOLLOW US: twitter.com/ratrodstudio

description: This is the FASTEST way to find restaurants on the go. OpenSnap is designed by a hungry team, utilizing the full OpenRice content from one million restaurants across Asia. The combination of passion for food and knowledge in this industry is the perfect recipe for the ideal photo dining guide. How it is different from other dining platforms: - A new way to Browse: Click as you go, the fastest way to find food without typing!! - Find restaurants by dish rating: A market first! - Personalized Bookmarks: All Food, favourite locations, restaurants and hot offers neatly organized in folders. Relevant content only! - Personalized Photo Album- all your food photos organized accordingly to restaurants and date (without writing!) - Personalized Socially: In addition to all the standard social features, follow Foodies according to your mutual tastes; a close-knitted food community. - Restaurant Info behind ALL photos: Access to Addresses, Maps, Phone, Reviews and Signature Dishes on EVERY page; simply click any restaurant names you see! *FEATURES* -BROWSE- Browse by cuisine, location, already grouped food topics and find something new everyday. -SEARCH- Search by dish, restaurants, location (city and country level) and use filters to quickly narrow down the results! -OFFERS- Enjoy offers from resturants and credit cards. -NEW RESTAURANTS- Bored of the old restaurants? Discover NEW restaurants EVERYDAY! -BOOKMARK- Whether it's restaurants, offers, topics or photos- bookmark the things you want to try! -RATING- Use our rating tool to rate the taste of your food. It's also an indicator to see if a dish is good (or bad)! -NEARBY - Find nearby Restaurants that you like and filter by cuisine, restaurant type and offers! -PERSONALIZED ALBUMS- All your photos automatically sorted by Restaurants and Home-Cooking, perfect for savouring your dining journey! -RESTAURANT DETAILS- View restaurants’ addresses, numbers, maps and OpenRice reviews before visiting Learn about our upcoming updates and join us: VISIT US: www.opensnap.com EMAIL US: support@OpenSnap.com LIKE US: facebook.com/opensnap FOLLOW US: twitter.com/opensnap
release_text: What’s new in 2.0.8 1. App Icon changed to Mid-Autumn Festival theme 2. Add a series of Mid-Autumn Festival themed Stickers 3. Editor recommend different restaurant for Mid-Autumn Festival Reunion Dinner

description: NAJNOWSZE KUPONY ZNIŻKOWE DO KFC, WAŻNE DO 07.10.2014 !!! AKTUALNE KUPONY !!! Aby skorzystać z kuponu w KFC, po prostu pokaż go na smartfonie lub tablecie przy kasie. Aplikacja zawiera kupony zniżkowe do restauracji KFC, pogrupowane w przejżysty sposób - od najtańszych, do najdroższych. Lista aktualnych kuponów do KFC: - 2 x DUŻE FRYTKI = 5,50 ZŁ - TWISTER + 3 HOT WINGS = 10 ZŁ - TWISTER + DUŻE FRYTKI = 10 ZŁ - TWISTER + 2 STRIPS = 10 ZŁ - TWISTER + WIELKA DOLEWKA = 10 ZŁ - 5 STRIPS + MAŁE FRYTKI = 10 ZŁ - 6 HOT WINGS + DUŻE FRYTKI = 10 ZŁ - ZINGER + DUŻE FRYTKI = 10 ZŁ - GRANDER + DUŻE FRYTKI = 13 ZŁ - 4 x NÓŻKA + MAŁE FRYTKI = 15 ZŁ - ZINGER + TWISTER + DUŻE FRYTKI = 15 ZŁ - ZINGER + 4 STRIPS = 15 ZŁ - 2 x TWISTER + MAŁE FRYTKI + DOLEWKA = 20 ZŁ - 4 x NÓŻKA + DUŻE FRYTKI + DOLEWKA = 20 ZŁ - 8 HOT WINGS + 4 STRIPS + 2 x MAŁE FRYTKI = 20 ZŁ - GRANDER + ZINGER + DUŻE FRYTKI = 20 ZŁ - GRANDER + TWISTER + DUŻE FRYTKI = 20 ZŁ - 2 x ZESTAW TWISTER CLASSIC = 25 ZŁ Jest to aplikacja nieoficjalna, stworzona aby ułatwić korzystanie z kuponów zniżkowych w restauracjach KFC (bez potrzeby drukowania kuponów czy łączenia się z internetem). Jeżeli chcecie wspomóc twórców gier niezależnych, ściągnijcie naszą darmową grę, podlinkowaną w aplikacji :) A teraz jedzmy, mniam! :D LATEST TO KFC discount coupons, VALID UNTIL 10/07/2014 !!! Coupons CURRENT !!! To use the coupon at KFC, just show it on your smartphone or tablet at the checkout. The application includes discount coupons to KFC, grouped in a clearly arranged way - from the cheapest to the most expensive. A list of current coupons for KFC: - 2 x BIG CHIPS = £ 5.50 - TWISTER + 3 HOT WINGS = £ 10 - TWISTER + BIG CHIPS = £ 10 - TWISTER + 2 = 10 ZL STRIPS - TWISTER + GREAT-up = £ 10 - 5 STRIPS + SMALL FRIES = £ 10 - 6 HOT WINGS + BIG CHIPS = £ 10 - ZINGER + BIG CHIPS = £ 10 - GRANDER + BIG CHIPS = £ 13 - 4 x FEET + SMALL FRIES = £ 15 - ZINGER + + BIG TWISTER FRIES = £ 15 - ZINGER STRIPS + 4 = 15 ZL - 2 x TWISTER + SMALL FRIES + refills = 20 ZL - 4 x + BIG FOOT CHIPS + refills = 20 ZL - 8 HOT WINGS + 4 STRIPS + 2 x SMALL FRIES = 20 ZL - GRANDER + ZINGER + BIG CHIPS = 20 ZL - GRANDER + + BIG TWISTER FRIES = 20 ZL - 2 x SET TWISTER CLASSIC = 25 ZL This is an unofficial app, designed to facilitate the use of discount coupons in restaurants KFC (no need to print coupons and connect to the Internet). If you want to support independent game developers, Please download our free game, Linked in your application :) And now let's eat, yum! D

Robo Shooter is a standard 2D Shooter game, a shmup. The player control is very simple. You can control your robot by touching anywhere on the screen of your device, and your robot's bullets are fired automatically. Also, you can set the following settings in a settings menu. - Sound : You can enable or disable gaming sound. - Screen size : You can change size of gaming screen. (Large / Medium / Small) - Player control : You can switch position of some information displayed on the screen, such as your score, a pause button, an energy gauge, etc. Other features: - 2 difficulty levels, each with an individual leaderboard. - 5 different stages, fighting bosses at the end of each stages. - Some power-up items. Please try this 2D shooting game, shoot'em up!
release_text: Changed the behavior when the back key is pressed. Changed the default setting of the sound.

description: Make a wish? You have many dreams, personal goals or birthday coming up? For example, provide your family or friends with unusual gift ideas, and you will always get the right gift. Also you've your personal goals always in view, and they're moved a little closer every day. Discover now the advantages of this simple wish list.

description: Essential Precalculus is the definitive resource for all things precalculus, especially designed for high school students. Built with the student in mind, it offers all the important formulas and concepts that they need to succeed, and nothing they don't. Essential Precalculus is a must-have study tool summarizing the absolute necessities that students need for the class and beyond. Topics include: -- Functions and their properties -- Trigonometry -- Conics -- Sequences

Start playing now for free! :)

description: *** Rock Radio *** - Streaming Online Rock Radio Why is **Rock Radio** the best? 1. More Stations YOU Want To Hear (86 and Counting) 2. Background Audio to surf the Web while you listen 3. Diverse Selection Of Channels (Classic Rock, Covers/Tributes, Independent, Rock Legends, Alternative, Metal, and More) "Rock Radio" Stations **Classic Rock** The Eagle (Classic) Classic Rock - The Best Classic Rock Ampz Classic Rock Classic Rock - Sky.FM Rock Classics Absolute Classic Rock Classic Deep Cuts Classic Rock Hits Rock 40 (Rock & Roll) **Alternative Rock** Alternative Rock Alternative Punk Rock 480 Minutes: Alternative Rock Classic Buzz (Alt) Acoustic Alternative The Buzz (Alt. Rock) Indie, Alternative - Germany Pinguin Radio Classic Alternative Devil's Night Radio Modern Alternative AltRadio KEXP Live Alternative Alternative HD Mega Shuffle Alternative *** Indie Rock *** Indie Pop Rocks Confusement Radio (Obscure Rock) Smile Cafe (Obscure Indie) Alternative Indie Rock DMPulse: Indie Rock Radio Elecrto-Pop & Indie Rock Dance Indie Rock Alternative **Tributes** Cover Me: All Covers A Beatles Tribute - Remakes, Hits, Tributes Pink Floyd FreeForm Beatles - 181.FM **Oldies** Oldies The 50s, 60s, & 70s Mellow Gold Classic Hits Good Time Oldies American Songbook **70's** Vinyl - 70's Hits Super 70's Soft 70's Lite Soft 70's Hits The Lynx Super 70's **80's** Absolute Radio 80s Classic New Wave 80's Hairband The Lynx Retro 80's Soft 80's Lite Soft 80's Hits Awesome 80's Underground 80s Only 80's Hits Lite 80's Retro Zone - 70's, 80's, & 90's **90's** Absolute Radio 90s Soft 90's Hit's Star 90's Lite 90's 90's Alternative 90's - Only 90's Hits **Modern Rock** Absolute Radio 00s rockXradio Today's Hits Niezalezne Rock Radio Purple - Only Rock Hits - Only Hits Power (top 40) UK Top 40 Rock **Hard Rock** Classic Hard Rock Heavy Metal Radio Today's Hard Rock Munich's Hardest Hits Pure Rock - Hard Rock & Metal GRIT - Hard Rock The Rock! (Hard Rock) Hair Voltage Radio Shock Box Pirate Station Pirate Rock Radio Maximum Rock **Punk** Punk Hard Core Pop Punk Garage Punk **Metal** From Hell Aggression Post Rock Metal Tome Radio ChroniX Metal Metal Masters Dark Metal Metal Assault Radio **Progressive Rock** Starstream Prog Rock Power Prog Radio Prog Rock of Yesterday & Today FAQs Q: Where can I find these stations online? A: Follow the link to the MadCalfApps.blogspot.com page in the app. Q: Why is the app not working on my device? A: Unfortunately, Rock Radio doesn't support all devices and operating systems. This is the main reason we have decided to bring this app to you totally FREE! Try it out to see if we are coming in loud and clear, "Nothing ventured nothing gained." We are adding support for new devices all the time. Q: Why are some stations blank at times? A: Some of these stations are controlled by real DJs and if they aren't playing anything at the time or their site is down no music will play. Fortunately we have over 80 Channels so you will always have a lot to choose from. Enjoy! Nick Mad Calf Apps

description: - Tap the screen to go through a standard 52 card deck (no jokers). - At any point tap the shuffle button to restart. - Plays shuffling sound when the deck is shuffled. - Free and ad free. - Top of the screen shows the number of cards remaining.

★★★★★ Over 3 million users on iPhone and iPad are already using our Free Tranport Maps, covering over 30 major cities around the world. This is our first beta release on Android. Please feed back any bugs or suggestions to us and we will improve our app for you. We have also lowered the introduction price of our map packs to just 99 cents during this testing phase, buy now to enjoy the low price before it goes back up to $2.99 and $9.99. (You will see the payment on Google Wallet as $0.99.) ★★★★★ 1 transport map available for free download (internet connection required). This app makes it easy to view large transport maps on your Android device. When you first launch the app, it downloads the latest version of the map from the web and process it into image tiles, this might take a few minutes. Once that is done, the future loading time will be very fast. Most PDF software on Android cannot handle large files well, they are slow in loading the files and zooming in. Our app is designed to be a fast reader for large image PDFs. You can also purchase our map packs (internet connection required) to download other publicly available PDF maps and store them on your Android device. You can download the maps when you have fast wifi connection - and then use any time in the future without delay. Please note that we do not provide any of the maps and by clicking on any of the links, you are downloading directly from the web and agreeing to the respective sites license agreement. The software helps you to store and load the downloaded copy to save repeated download time and costs. We believe that anyone with a smartphone should be able to have PDF travel maps on their device and we are working hard to help eliminating the use of paper for travel maps. ✔ Download (internet connection required) and store maps and guides for offline use - no more time-consuming searches! ✔ Works with most Android devices with tablet support. ✔ Supports the pinch-to-zoom feature! ✔ Tap on the map for full screen view to hide the toolbars. ✔ Simple user interface and intuitive user experience. ✔ Add Map Packs with in-app purchase. COMING SOON: Our team is already working on the next version which is even faster, other new features including customizable list for adding and sorting your own list of maps and guides, favorites lists, integration with web community, user-ratings and translation into many languages. Stay tuned for the free update. We have transport map for the following cities: London, New York, Tokyo, Bangkok, Singapore, Paris, Beijing, San Francisco, Chicago, Madrid, Hong Kong, Brussels, Los Angeles, Geneva, Miami, Amsterdam, Vienna, Philadelphia, Atlanta, Dallas, Buenos Aires, Sao Paulo, Toronto, Shanghai, Prague, Lyon, Rennes, Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Athens, Delhi, Milan, Naples, Turin, Fukuoka, Kyoto, Nagoya, Osaka, Sapporo, Kuala Lumpur, Mexico City, Rotterdam, Oslo, Moscow, Seoul, Barcelona, Stockholm, Lausanne, Glasgow, Newcastle / Sunderland, Baltimore, Cleveland, Valencia, Porto and Rio de Janeiro. ★★★★★ Our Production Team iOS Development: Myles Harding, Jin Khera Graphic Design: Nancy Wu, Bella Xue, Amy Xu Administrative Support: Sai Wu Producer: Edward Tsang ★★★★★ Please understand that this is an ongoing development. If you have found any issues or bugs, please let us know by email, support@ondemandworld.com . We will solve them with free updates. Check out http://www.ondemandworld.com/wheretoeat/ for more info. ➔ Follow us on Twitter. http://twitter.com/ondemandworld ‼ Like us on Facebook. http://facebook.com/ondemandworld
Life Quotes. Nobody’s got all the answers. We all need some advice and motivation from time to time. This app contains over 500 of the best Life quotes, so you can live life to the fullest!

Designs 2 is a photo editor of adding text on photos. The application provide the users capability to add text, change font, background, add stickers and effects and change font format. The main features of the app are: + Adding text on photos. + Adding many text lines. + Formatting text (size, color, reflection, shadow). + More than 50 font types. + More than 100 backgrounds images. + Adding photo from studio. + More than 160 stickers. + More than 20 effects. + More than 20 frames. How to Use: See help of the application. If you have any problem please send an email to us and we will solve the problem as soon as possible and specify your mobile model in the email. Don't give 1 start before contacting us.

생리 달력을 쓰면서 한번쯤 해보는 생각들.. 생리주기만 잘 관리하면 효과적인 다이어트를 할 수 있다는데.. 생리 주기를 관리하면서 황금기도 알려주는 그런 어플 없을까? 이런 고민을 한번쯤 해보셨던 여성분들께 도움이 될 어플이 나왔습니다. ^^ 황금기알리미는 생리주기캘린더의 기능을 소화할 뿐만 아니라 다이어트 황금기 또한 알려주는 스마트한 매직 캘린더입니다. 생리주기, 생리기간, 가임기, 배란일을 한눈에 볼 수 있도록 해주며, 사랑일, 약 복용일, 체온, 메모 등을 간편한 동작으로 스마트하게 입력이 가능합니다. 또한 주기가 불균형한 분들을 위해 나만의 매직데이를 따로 입력할 수 있으며 최대한 간소화하여 앱을 최적화했습니다. 또한 매직톡을 지원하여 공주님들끼리 서로 비밀스런 대화도 나눌 수 있답니다. ^^ 기존 살빼는법2 어플 사용자시라면 전혀 낮설지 않을 재미있는 기능들을 만나보실 수 있습니다. ^^ 황금기 다이어트를 하시는 유저분이라면 꼭 이 생리피임달력을 함께 이용해주세요. 다이어트와 주기를 안정적으로 관리해줄 여성 달력이랍니다~ 올 여름 다이어트와 함께 여성 생리 달력 어플을 함께 사용해보세요~ 후회하지 않으실겁니다 ^^ * 도움말 * 1. 생리주기를 어떻게 계산하나요? - 달력에서 최근 생리일을 더블클릭 하신 후 생리 시작일로 설정해주시면 자동 계산됩니다. 2. 생리 주기를 따로 설정하고 싶은데 어디서 바꾸죠? - 하단의 『설정』 탭에서 『생리 주기 설정』 를 한번 클릭하여 몸에 맞는 생리 주기를 입력해주시면 됩니다. 모르신다면 『모름』 버튼을 눌러 최근 생리일자들을 기준으로 평균 생리주기를 얻어낼 수 있습니다. 3. 생리 기간을 따로 설정하고 싶은데 어디서 바꾸죠? - 하단의 『설정』 탭에서 『생리 기간 설정』 를 한번 클릭하여 몸에 맞는 생리 기간을 입력해주시면 됩니다. 4. 황금기 알리미는 어디있나요? - 하단의 『설정』 탭에서 『황금기 표시여부』 를 한번 클릭하여 『표시함』 으로 만들어주시면 황금기가 달력에 나옵니다. 5. 생리 기간이 불규칙 하면 어떡해요? - 주기는 일정한데 생리 기간이 늘었다 주는 분들은 만약 하루를 더 했다면 해당 날짜를 더블클릭 후 『이 날도 생리함』 에 체크해주시면 생리일로 기록이 됩니다. description: This is a dictionary plugin for Honso Keyboards. Please install O Keyboard  or Multiling Keyboard

The naughty little mouse has consumed all of your cheese. Outraged, you decided to catch the thief and gives it some delicious revenge. In this game, your target is to trap the mouse before it escapes. When the game starts, the mouse will stay at the center of a large mat composed of multiple hexagonal tiles and a number of pillars. Each time when you click any of the empty tiles to place a pillar, the mouse will move to an adjacent tile. Continue the process until you successfully trap the mouse. Note that you need to accomplish your goal before the mouse moves out of the mat, or you will lose. You will start the game with 20000 points, as shown at the top left corner of the screen. Each time you place a pillar onto the mat, 50 points will be deducted. Can you construct an unbreakable trap?

The most powerful multitrack audio/MIDI recording studio on Android with support for over 250 USB audio/MIDI interfaces, virtual instruments(*), packed with features like non-linear non-destructive editing with unlimited undo/redo, mixing, real-time effects, automation and much more! Note that this is a TRIAL version of the full paid version and of course does not include saving of projects! (*) The following in-app purchases are available in the full version to enable the following features: • USB audio interface support (you can also purchase USB Audio Recorder PRO). Please see our compatibility list here http://www.extreamsd.com/USBAudioRecorderPRO and for more information: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=usbaudiosupport • MIDI/virtual instrument support (enables MIDI sequencing, USB MIDI and virtual instruments) • FX pack 1 (distortion, overdrive, speaker sim, wah wah, phaser) • FX pack 2 (10-, 15-, 30-band graphic EQ) • ToneBoosters pack 1 (Barricade, DeEsser, Gate, Reverb) • ToneBoosters EQ with frequency analyzer • ToneBoosters Compressor • Autotune with two-voice harmonizer Features: • Multitrack audio recording/playback • MIDI sequencing (in-app purchase required) • Non-linear non-destructive editing with move, trim, split, cut/copy/paste, remove, cross-fade and range editing • Virtual instruments based on SoundFonts (in-app purchase required) • Loop playback • Automation of all mixer and effect parameters • Latency correction • Import of WAV, MP3, AIFF, FLAC, Ogg/Vorbis audio files (m4a and others when running Android 4.1 or higher) • Mastering (mixdown) to stereo WAV, AIFF, FLAC or OGG file • Software monitoring for USB audio devices and some Android devices that have low enough latency • Sample rate conversion • Metronome • Punch in/out • Zoom down to the sample • Each track has controls for volume, panning, mute, solo, arm, 3-band EQ with mid-sweep, 3 insert effects, 2 effect sends and output bus selection • Unlimited number of tracks (*) • Unlimited number of groups (*) • Real-time effects including: chorus, compressor, delay, dual delay, reverse delay, reverb, flanger, noise gate and many more! • Offline effects: fade in/out, normalize, reverse, pitch shift, time stretching while maintaining pitch • Unlimited undo/redo for editing facilities • Grid options for aligning your samples (with tempo and time signature) • Repeat samples with several options to create loops • Projects are interchangeable with our desktop DAW Audio Evolution 5 • Export to other DAW's by rendering all tracks to separate audio files (stems) • In short: a complete portable multi track music studio that will replace your 4 track recorder or tape machine, almost for free! (*) Depending on your hardware's capabilities Requirements: • 800x480 screen size or higher • Android 2.3.3 or higher If you are looking for something similar to Cubase or Cubasis, this is it! Note: this app can only run in landscape. Trying to run it with apps like Ultimate Rotation Control can result in crashes. If you have any suggestions, questions or want to report a bug, please contact us! Instead of a negative review, please have the decency to contact us so we can actually solve your problem! Loop packs, see for example: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.extreamsd.housefreepack Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/AudioEvolution5 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AudioEvolutionMobile Forum: http://www.extreamsd.com/forum Online manual: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=start To prevent your device's mic from picking up what the speaker is playing back, we recommend using either: * a USB audio interface or * an iRig MIC Cast: http://www.ikmultimedia.com/products/irigmiccast . The iRig is of better quality and playback is done through its headphone output. Note that hardware monitoring is not possible and you won't hear what you are recording through the headphone.
release_text: • The pitch shifter should now produce the exact same number of frames as the original. • Fixed some bugs in the autotune plug-in. • Fixed bug in fx send which could cause playback fail to start or entire freezes. • Disabling the status screen also disabled checking for USB audio/MIDI in-app purchases. Solved. • Pressing Undo while a track was armed could move the time marker. Solved.

description: Juicy game, brain teaser and fun in one. This is game you gone love. Play the next generation of Threes / 2048 puzzle. Challenge 60 levels with different tables and goals, or try the Classic game mode!

description: **** 9.2 / 10 "One of the most entertaining and reliable movie apps available right now" Life of Android **** Don’t ever waste time by searching for newest trailers from different sources, we can do that for you. Watch trailers on your android smartphone or tablet wherever you have internet access. In bed, lying on a couch, on the way to work or during lunch. We don't focus just on those big blockbuster movies, you will also find indie movies, documentaries and many more! The app has very simple gallery-like interface. No need for browsing different screens with info you don’t even need. You are always just two taps away from watching a trailer. • Daily updates (We are the most actual app on google play) • No clips and featurettes (only trailers) • No need for external video player to play trailers • Each trailer in HD as well • Simple UI • The only trailer source you will need FEATURES OF PRO VERSION: • Sort movies by release date. Now you can easily see what’s in the theaters today • Download a trailer for later (offline) watching (This feature is not working at the moment, we are sorry for the inconvenience) • Add release date of a movie as an event to your Google Calendar with just one tap • Add movies to your favorites list to mark those you are interested in • And of course, no ads If you want to know about the newest movies, this is the right choice for you. Try it out. ---- There is a compatibility issue with Samsung Galaxy S6 and Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge phones ----
release_text: • Trailers requiring sign in for android versions 5.0 and above, now opens YouTube application

description: UEFA Champions League Fantasy Football has come to your mobile: create, manage, transfer and get live updates on the move with the game’s official app. Create a team from scratch, browsing through all the players – from Neuer to Messi – to select the best possible 15-man squad, and also play Top Five, the new game based on fantasy matchday scoring. Already have a team? Use the app to make transfers, mid-matchweek substitutions and captain changes, formation tweaks and even change your team name. See how you are getting on against the rest: check where you are in your personal leagues, the overall standings, against the Tipsters and join new leagues as well. Share new leagues and teams. Watch your points roll in as the games happen with live updates on the app. Forgot to change your team at work or at home? No problem – the app has manageable push notifications to remind you to make your changes before the deadline.

A Strategy Builder Multiplayer Game set in the romance of the Medieval age! Rule as Lord of your city, recruiting Knights to battle, managing your serfs to gather resources, and build your city into a bastion of strength and hope. Carefully allocate resources to feed and grow your city, forge great treasures, strategically make and break alliances, develop your knowledge of ancient magic. Prevail in the ultimate goal to overthrow the Dark Knight and his Dragons, and establish a noble and tranquil Camelot in a sea of turmoil. EPIC STORY The Dark Knight has cast his shadow over the lands, and calamity has beset the villagers through the onslaught of the Dragons. You are recruited to serve as Lord of your fiefdom, to beat back this ancient terror, and defeat the darkness and his servants. Villagers rally to your cause as your reputation grows, are you the long awaited Chosen One that will restore peace and prosperity to the lands? STRATEGY AND ACTION Real-time strategy, requiring thoughtful planning and allocation of resources, for both offense and defense. Build, craft, heal, study magic, train! EPIC QUESTS Multi-stage quests involving battles, exploration, and compelling storylines to engage and maintain player interest. PVP AND GUILD ACTION With real-time MMO systems, engage with thousands of players around the world in Mail, Chat, Friend quests, Group B8battles and collaborations. VISUAL SPLENDOR Expansive set of zones with variety of exquisitely drawn landscapes, and detailed character renderings. HD DISPLAY GRAPHICS! 1080p ready for a hi-def gaming experience OPTIMIZED FOR ANDROID Supported on tablets of all makes and sizes

Discover a new way to play the world's favorite Bejeweled mechanics! Create chains of similar figures to unlock colored tiles. Beat your opponents online and see how high you can score in the global leader board. Download Fitz and get a brilliant mood recharger! Features: ♦ Develop your matching skills ♦ Enjoy free multiplayer mode ♦ Solve puzzles faster than your opponent to get bonus score ♦ Submit achievements to the global leaderboard ♦ Choose your language of interface among many available ♦ Pleasant graphics and sounds make this game nice and relaxing This Match-3 puzzle is easy to learn, yet hard to master. Every new level presents you much more perplexing grids so you’ll need all your matching experience to get through this challenge. Improve your skills, discover tricks and compete with other players in multiplayer mode. Download the game and start your own adventure through the match 3 world of Fitz!
release_text: ● New version 1.4.5 supports Android 5.0 ● We have polished the game and fixed some small issues

description: Perform the mutli-stage Bleep Fitness Test to determine your true level of fitness. It is designed to push your stamina and endurance to the limit. The test is often regarded as one of the key entry requirements for most police and military service entry across the globe is available on your Android phone. The Bleep Fitness Test is a handy component for anyone serious about their fitness regime. Free Key Features: * Single user profile * Configurable audio cues indicating the start of each shuttle and level * 15 or 20 metre shuttle distance * Calculates users VO2Max performance with rating * Tablular display of users results * Share your results via email, SMS, google+, facebook (requires app to be installed) * Easy to read and use UI * Lock phone and app continues to run * Contains adverts Additional Paid Features: * Multiple users profiles and results history * No adverts This app uses text to speech (TTS) so requires an approiate text to speech app (see https://market.android.com/developer?pub=Android+TextToSpeech) The Bleep Test is also known as Beep Test, Shuttle Run, Pacer Test or Multistage Fitness Test.
release_text: Fix stability issues, break up of audio and remove ads from main page.

description: For kids that love to paint! Palette Painter is the easiest way to turn your tablet into a painter's canvas. It is easy to pick paints and brushes so you can focus on your art. ** Optimized for tablets (7” or bigger) ** Fun things to do with Paint & Draw are: - Paint a masterpiece from a blank canvas to finish. - Paint on a page from a coloring book. - Take photos of friends and draw a funny face on them. - Use the widget for quick notes and write a special note on a friend's tablet. - Save and easily share your paintings with your friends. Advanced features include: - Custom color palette - Custom brush types - Endless canvas perfect for notes.
release_text: Version 1.3.2 - Fixed freezing on secondary accounts. - Crash fixes, other bug fixes. Version 1.3.1 - Fixes to billing library. - Crash fixes. - Improvements to widgets on older devices. Version 1.3.0 - Improved save speed and stability. - Fixed widgets on Android 4.4+ - Added repaint file loader. - Added new coloring book pages. - Added undo bars to delete/load. - Bug fixes.

description: This Android app was specifically developed to SIM unlock any Motorola Moto handset. The app can be downloaded and installed for free. However the actual unlocking of the phone is a paid service. We are a distributor for the Moto codes. At the time when a handset is manufactured, its IMEI (15 digits serial) together with a unique set of codes is stored in a database. The manufacturer via the carriers and third-party professional services like ours distributes these codes. It is extremely easy to unlock your Motorola. Just use this app to get the code associated to your phone. Most of the times the delivery for Moto codes take only minutes. Once you have the code you can unlock your phone only in a few moments. The procedure can be performed anywhere: local or abroad. There is no need to have access to a SIM of the original carrier. IMPORTANT: ★ This app is not hacking your phone; it is not required to root the phone or to perform any other action that can void the phone warranty. We are a reseller for the manufacturer database of codes. We are using the codes and the unlocking procedure of the manufacturer (the same as your carrier and certified phone service centres). ★ After unlocking, your Motorola Moto handset will be practically "Neverlocked". Unlocking is permanent and general. After unlock you will be able to use your Note with any GSM carrier around the world. Also, you will be able to install any firmware version (stock or custom), upgrades OTA and even factory reset. ★ If your Moto phone it is reported as Stolen/Lost/With-Payment-issues it will not work although it is network unlocked. If you suspect that the carrier blacklisted your phone please contact us for assistance. If it is your case and you still order you will NOT be eligible for a refund. Factory unlocking will not solve the carrier ban. You can read more on our website. ★ Make sure that your phone is asking for the network unlocking code when you insert a SIM card of a different carrier. KEEP UP ON "SIM Unlock for Motorola Moto": For tips and other helpful information visit our website http://www.imei-unlocker.com and follow us via https://twitter.com/imei_unlocker on Twitter, on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/imeiunlocker or Google+ at https://plus.google.com/+Imei-unlocker . Thanks to all our users for your support and advice! If you are having technical issues or have any questions, email us at support@imei-unlocker.com or use the help section of the application. “SIM Unlock for Motorola Moto” application and imei-unlocker.com online service are not affiliated with or endorsed by any phone maker or carrier. All manufactures and carriers trade names/logos are for reference use only and are in no way connected to our services.

smartChord Tuner is a precise chromatic tuner, which picks up the tones of your instrument by the microphone of your smartphone and then analyses and visualises them in different ways. On the display you can see: - the recognized note inclusive her octave, - the frequency of the played note in Hertz, as well as the target frequency of the note. - a scale with colours, showing to what extent the right tone is striked. - the audio signal itself, to see, what is coming in by the microphone. Besides the visualization you can let your smartphone vibrate, as soon as the the recognized frequency is corresponding with the aspired frequency. ======== PLEASE NOTE ========= smartChords Tuner is a plugin for the app 'smart Chords & Tools' (V2.13 or later). It can't run alone! You need to install 'smart Chords & Tools' from the Google Play store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.smartchord.droid smartChords provides a lot of other useful tools for musicians like the ultimate chord reference and scales. Furthermore there is a chromatic tuner, a metronome, an ear training quiz, and a lot of other cool stuff. smart Chords provides a lot of instruments like guitar, ukulele, mandolin or the bass and a lot of different tunings. ==============================

Fresh from the oven, Cooking for Girls is here. Ever wanted to cook mouthwatering delicacies all by yourself? Well, then you have a great chance to show off your cooking skills with this super app. Make Burgers, Ice Creams, Cakes, Pizzas, Sandwiches, Cupcakes, Pastries and Donuts and show off your creative culinary skills. Young girls can get their hands on ten different foods: Burger, two types of Ice Cream, Sandwich, two types of Cake, Pizza, Donut, Pastry and Cupcake. Make your imagination and creativity go crazy to make the most sumptuous and appetizing food. A variety of fillings, veggies, toppings and ingredients make the app a tasty treat all the way. Play around with the ingredients and make your very own meal today. Flaunt your cooking to your friends by saving your creation on your phone as an image and share it on Facebook, Twitter, Email. Features: * 10 food items to choose from: Burger, 2 types of Ice Cream, Sandwich, 2 types of Cake, Pizza, Donut, Pastry and Cupcake. * Save and share your creations. * Loads of options and ingredients available. A fun and exciting way to cook some of your all time favorite food items! Get out the apron with this app today!
release_text: - 5 new games added. - Make Ice Cream, Cake, Donut, Pastry and Cupcake. - Localized for more languages

description: Construct, Test Drive, Build and Race with all your favorite Cars in Car Creator! Build an empire based on building and customizing various Automotives in this unique blend of simulation and racing. Suitable for kids and adults alike with your own custom garage and your specially designed cars built through your imagination! Take the driver seat in the newest automobile start up in the country with Car Creator, where you can test drive on with awesome tracks and market all the different models that you design. Choose from over 80 different parts to create your own car Change colors and add decals Watch your car being promoted via a "TV commercial" Show off your Car We will be adding more parts in future updates! Stay tuned! REPORT A PROBLEM The is the beta version of Car Creator. For any feedback, questions, or concerns regarding the app, please email the details and your device name to support@animoca.com . ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

This app is designed to be used every day to download and display your favorite daily comic strips. The strip images are located by searching the comic's web page for a key string that begin's the image address, or by building a direct address to the image, and then receives the image into a local file on the device. Each image is then displayed in a slide show which the user controls by swiping the images left and right on the screen. The images can also be expanded or rotated to make them easier to read on a smaller device. Over 350 comic strips are built into the app but other comics can be added by the user. (The "light" version of this app will only display up to 15 comics at a time.)
release_text: Corrected an error which prevented adding more comics than 15.

description: Do you have a little princess that adores Cinderella? Then dance and spin into some true blue fun with the Cinderella Princess Games Activity & Sound App! Your little princess will have an enchanting time playing with Cinderella puzzles, Cinderella games, and learning the color blue with Cinderella in this delight-filled activity app designed for ages 2 & up, and first time app users. When you download the Cinderella Princess Games Activity & Sound App you’ll get a world of Cinderella fun with: 4 Cinderella Puzzles- Designed for ages 3 & up these beautiful blue princess puzzles are sure to delight. 1 Cinderella Match Game- Play with the characters in this classic tale in this sweet memory game designed for ages 2 & up. 1 Cupcake Throw Game- This cute princess game is so much fun for ages 2 & up. Interactive Sounds- Including a question from Princess Cinderella! Interactive fun for all ages. Cinderella Speaks The first stop on the carriage ride of delight in the princess toddler games app that will delight any Cinderella lover- real sounds! With just a tap discover and enjoy Cinderella herself asking a question and listen as Cinderella spells the word BLUE on this interactive special feature. Cinderella Puzzles For even more twinkling fun in the Cinderella games free app try the Cinderella puzzle games. The enchanting blue princess toddler puzzles that are very engaging and playing the princess toddler games also encourage: -Fine motor skills -Reasoning and concept development -Early math skills How To Play Puzzle Tap “Randomize” on any puzzle and it will magically shuffle. And if your little princess doesn’t like the look of that one, just press Randomize again to shake it up differently. *Some other fun ways to let your little princesses under the age of 4 play with the puzzles also is: 1. Count the flowers, presents, stairs, and the other cute things in the pictures. Ask what color they are, what’s bigger or smaller, and what’s on the top and bottom of each picture. 2. Let them tap randomize, slide a few pieces and then tap the back button. This is a simple way to introduce them to using the Cinderella fun games app, develop fine motor skills, and it’s very entertaining for them to see the puzzles scramble. Cinderella Match Game Twirl into the fun in the princess games for girls with this fairy tale themed toddler match game that's delightful fun, and playing the Cinderella palace games will also encourage: -Fine motor skills. -Memory and recognition skills. -Vocabulary and language. -Recognizing the color blue. Cupcake Throw Game This engaging game is excellent for promoting concentration and fine motor skills. And when they win your little princess will get to see a handsome prince giving her a trophy! Design Team: Nancy, Deborah, Jasmine, Sophia, & Belle-Ann. Have a magical and star filled time discovering and playing with Princess Cinderella and the color BLUE with the Cinderella Princess Games Activity & Sound App and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n’ Learn App!

description: This is a book reader to download books from online for you to read. There are tens of thousands of free books to choose from, as well as some others available for a small price. With our book downloader app, you can put together a collection of ebooks into your own ebook library on your Android. There are plenty of books to reference, not only for adults, but children, kids and teens as well. Just download free books from online and put them on your Android device, to read at your leisure. We have tens of thousands of free books from many genres. We have romance novels. Love stories like: * Romeo and Juliet by William Shakespeare * Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen * The Age of Innocence by Edith Wharton We have stories for children - kid's books such as Little Women, Alice in Wonderland, Cinderella, Peter Pan and Treasure Island. We have downloadable tales of horror from H. P. Lovecraft, and the original vampire tale, Bram Stoker's Dracula. Read how detective Sherlock Holmes solves another case, or read a mystery by Agatha Christie. Study from religious books like the Bible. Learn about psychology from Sigmund Freud and Alfred Binet. Enjoy reading a book from Charles Dickens such as Great Expectations and Oliver Twist. Enjoy science fiction stories like the Time Machine by H. G. Wells, as well as sci-fi e-books from the 1950s by Philip K. Dick, Frederik Pohl and Kurt Vonnegut. And more. All for free. This e-reader is a modified version of FBReader. It is modified so that it downloads electronic books in Spanish, French, German, Dutch, Italian and so forth a little more easily. This program is GPL licensed, and computer programmers can access our source code on our web site. It primarily handles books in the epub format.
